The range of food is fantastic, and she took care of us on every visit after a day of excursions. Aside from the star of the show, the pools were great, water just a little cold, but super views to be had of the surrounding area. It's a really great place to explore the entire of Singapore from. Hotel very modern, breakfast were super.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Fabulous hotel! Modern, with fantastic views and great amenities. The pools are just great to relax and unwind. But most importantly I would like to highlight the service! Everyone has been so accommodating and welcoming, specially the team at the executive lounge ( Hazel, John and Gab were fab and made our stay even better). The food was delicious too, great chefs! Will be coming back for sure!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: MEMORABLE and AMAZING STAY - SINGAPORE
desc: From Tony R I had a wonderful stayed the second time around at JW Marriott Singapore. The room is so nice and its facing the street towards Fullerton Hotel and I can see part of the Marina Bay Sands Hotel (MBS). The view outside was amazing! I don’t need to go out to see the MBS fireworks. The variety of food at South Beach Restaurant during breakfast and the hors d'oeuvres at the club lounge are sumptuous! What made my stay so amazing was JW Marriott have an outstanding staff like Sarah Lorenzo, Hazel, Cora, Gabriel, Joyce, Talgat and Loraine who are so dedicated to their job, extremely friendly, hospitable and helpful who made me feel being at home throughout my stay. Stacy, the Director of Sales was so prompt to respond to my inquiry. BZ to all the amazing staff at JW

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent Room and Service
desc: We went to JW for our honeymoon, and we were surprised with their hospitality, especially the attendant Sarah. They even gave us a welcome cake. The room is nice and clean, and we specifically loved the bath tub so much! They gave us water bottles when they noticed we ran out of them, and left us with lens cleaner when they saw i was wearing eyeglasses without me asking! Thoughtful and A++++ service! Hoping to be back someday. Thank you JW Mariott! Your service is highly commendable.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Enjoyable stay at JW Marriott
desc: Stay in JW Marriot and it was truly a pleasnt experience. Room is well maintained and the Club lounge is fantastic. I have met very welcoming Staffs like Hazel, Hanna and Gab. They are always with smile and treat the guests with Warm hospitality. I will come back to stay again and hope to see the Lounge staffs for my next visit.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Celebrating Singapore’s National Day
desc: After being grounded in Hong Kong for 2-3 years, I was finally able to travel again and Singapore was my first stop. I was staying at this property for 5 nights, thanks to my Marriott Bonvoy Titanium status, I was upgraded to a room with the Marina Bay View and that was perfect since I was able to watch the fireworks in the comfort of my room. I’ve always heard about the iconic swimming pool at the hotel, so I went up to the wellness floor and I was greeted by Prasanth Nedumpurath at the gym. He showed me around and walked me through all the wellness facilities at the hotel. Thanks for the guided tour and I can tell he very much loves his hotel. I also visited the Chinese restaurant Madame Fan, and I have to say it is such a classy place with delicious Chinese food. While I

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent customer service
desc: Kudos to the friendly staffs making our stay a pleasant memorable one. Miss maganda hazel from lounge, making sure we have enough food and drinks throughout our seating. Chef kok Ann, bringing blueberries to my table when it ran out from the breakfast buffet. Recommending us their buffet menu. Miss Rebecca from front desk, after requesting of changing of suites trying to best accommodate our needs. Thank you all. And will definitely be coming back for another staycation. Ann

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Gorgeous hotel, top notch service!
desc: Hotel room is really clean and gorgeous! Nice view of SG's landmarks as well (Esplanade and MBS for the Bayview). Received very warm hospitality by the servers at the Executive Club Lounge. Shout out to Hazel for going the extra mile and accomodating to our requests. Extensive choices of food and they were really delicious too! Highly recommended for hotel staycays! :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: 6* Team JW Executive Lounge
desc: If you are still contemplating on whether to make a staycation booking at Jw Marriott Singapore, think no further, but make sure you book a room with executive lounge! The lounge is excellent! Cocktail hours from 5.30-9pm. Fabulous food offering, great cocktails and a superb team. As long as they have the raw ingredients, any cocktail you want, you get it! A big thank you to Hazel, John and Kay and everyone else on shift on 20 Aug Sat! We truly had an enjoyable time at the lounge and it was simply the highlight of the entire staycation. We wanted more nachos despite kitchen closed but hazel and team just made it happen. It's definitely one of the best executive lounges in Singapore! And the team definitely deserves a big thank you and a pat on the back!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay at JW South Beach Singapore
desc: I came to Singapore for work and our team stayed 5 nights at the JW South Beach. It was the perfect hotel! Everyone is incredibly kind and helpful, the facilities are amazing, and the location is super centric so it’s very convenient to explore the city. The lounge is top notch, amazing food and drinks every day. Hazel was incredible and made our stay even better. She was always there to greet us, reserved our favorite spot for us every day, and always made sure we had everything we needed! I’m impressed by the kindness and service we received from Hazel and everyone else. We’ll be back!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A visit worth to remember!
desc: Marriot hotel and their staff has eased the burden of travelling as a family. Kudos to their staff but a special thanks to Ms. Hazel and Mr. Gab for their one of a kind hospitality and Ms. Sarah for her open arms welcome as a receptionist. We may be a thousand miles away from home but it semed as if we never left it.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Get the room with lounge!
desc: My fiancée and I did a one night staycation at JW mariott. Don’t expect much for the room. But the lounge had yummy food and cocktails! Hazel was welcoming and friendly and always made sure our cups and bellies were full. Do get breakfast at South Beach Kitchen! The breakfast selection was robust and delicious. Uncle Richard is such a sweet man who attended to us and was very prompt in clearing our empty plates. Thank you for great customer service which made our stay enjoyable!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exutive Lounge Staff… where everyone knows your name.
desc: Just getting ready to check out of the JW Marriott in Singapore it is absolutely beautiful. The pool on the 18th floor is spectacular and the views are amazing. We also spent quite a bit of time in the executive lounge everyone is so hospitable and literally know you by name. They start bringing you things that you ordered before making sure you had enough and ask if there’s anything else that they can do to help or guide you anywhere, we felt very very pampered. The food was great. Hazel was the best she made us her famous pink drink and made sure we always felt welcome.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the best hotel in Singapore
desc: My stay at this lovely and modern hotel was amazing after 2 years i haven't return to Jw Marriot Sg!. Check in-Smooth and the staff at reception provided outstanding service! Room-Superb! Breakfast-Top notch Poolside-Amazing with nice pool attendants The only feedback that i have is this hotel suppose to have Gym instructor like Marina Bay Sands and Pan Pac hotel. Last time before covid i know that there is 1 gym Supervisor at Jw. Probably the gym should add more strength machines like Cybex Hack Squat and Prone leg curl.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing fireworks seen from Marina Bay view room and excellent executive lounge
desc: Spent a good 3 nights' stay at this property. Thanks for the celebratory cake and warm hospitality from the staff at executive lounge. Special mention goes to Hazel who helped us to get drinks earlier than the usual 5.30pm so that we can go up to watch NDP from the comfort of our room by 6pm. I used their mobile chat services and the replies are always prompt. Remember to go to the EBB6 pool instead of the one at level 18 as the one at level 18 is too chilly for a swim. You have to go to the East tower by taking the lift and crossing the bridge at level 2, then head to level 6.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great NDP22 Stay
desc: Great stay thanks to the hardworking team on duty during National Day 22! Enjoyed the evening cocktails at the amazing Executive Lounge and breakfast at South Beach Kitchen! Hope to be back during the October F1 race!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay
desc: The hotel is clean and really pretty, and our stay was quite nice. The staff are all kind and professional, especially Hazel, Kay, and Hanna. Hazel was phenomenal, took care of us, took time to learn a bit about us and always was there to offer help. She was very warm and welcoming as well. We’ll surely come back again!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Our Five Day Stay at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach
desc: Those five days at the JW Marriott Singapore South Beach were memorable as we enjoyed indulging delicious meals at the Beach Road Kitchen during breakfast time and the afternoon tea/cocktails/dinner are superb at the Executive Lounge. The room made us comfortable too. Our special thanks goes to Hazel, Cora, and Gab from the executive lounge for their hospitality. You have done a great job! ✨ 😁👍 ✨ - Mr. and Mrs. Nicolas (Philippines)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Honeymoon Trip
desc: My husband and I stayed here as part of our honeymoon trip and loved the hotel. Our room was nice but the bathroom was on the small side in comparison to the rest of the room. The best part were the amenities - the pool, the gym, and the lounge. Hazel is the lounge’s hostess with the mostess and took care of us, simultaneously taking care of everyone else every day. She runs it like a well-oiled machine. Will definitely stay here again when I return for business or pleasure.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome hotel and staff
desc: The hotel is in a great location, close by to the Gardens in the Bay and in walking distance of many other top sights. Direct access to the MRT if you want to use this to get around. Arrived late at night and check in was quick. Very well designed room, really quiet, heated toilet seat! Great views. Used the gym a number of times, well equipped. Club lounge one of the best we’ve experienced - afternoon tea varies each day, all delicious items. Evening food for two hours each evening, again varied each day and always delicious. The team were great at accommodating for my husbands food allergy and made him his own dishes - so a huge thanks to the team Cora the manager, and all the staff Antonio, Lorraene, Hannah, John and Karthik - all so friendly, remembered your drink

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional property and services
desc: I am a Titanium member, staying over 90 nights so far this year at various Marriott properties across across western & Eastern European countries and Asia. This JW is the best in its class. The property, rooms, restaurants, specially Executive Lounge food and service are exceptional. Wished I had stayed here instead of around Orchard road in the past 20+ years

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW is worth it!
desc: I was able to stay at this JW this past weekend and had an amazing time. The facilities were updated and clean, with the interior design being my favorite out of all the past Mariotts I have visited. I want to specifically express my gratitude toward Hazel, Gab, Kay, and Chef Jerome in the Executive Lounge. My party came in late and they were more than accommodating to meet the needs of tired and hungry travelers. This lounge had one of the best foods served during afternoon tea with exceptional service each and every time we dined there. Hazel was very warm and welcoming and definitely made our stay worth it. If you are traveling to Singapore I would highly recommend staying at this hotel,

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great City Hotel
desc: Great Hotel in Singapore. Especially the amenities, rooms and breakfast. However, the pool facilities are in other 5 star hotels in Singapore much better. At JW Marriott there are no sunbeds and no real flair. I really want to express a huge THANK YOU to housekeeping Julie! Perfect, friendly. You made my stay wonderful.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Stopover
desc: Had another great stopover stay at jw Marriott - the staff are amazing, esp in the club executive room. Hazel & karthik needs a special mention as they are very efficient, professional & hard working. Delivering service with a smile at all times, they let us know when food & drinks were about to finish etc & giving heaps of communication & making sure we were happy. I must also mention the cleaner she was so lovely & happy, Our room was always very clean, unfortunately I didn’t get her name(16th floor) Chef sum very good as he let us know what ingredients were in each dish (important information as I have a seafood allergy) & the food was lovely each evening. Only gave 4 star because I would like to have the food warmer at breakfast esp bacon & eggs etc at beach rd cafe -

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights and every single interaction with staff was excellent. Staff are very well trained and have very good attention to detail. We stayed in a suite on the 21st floor and the room was great. Spacious, lots of light, good views, very good bathroom incl bath, and very clean. Hotel is very well maintained. The lounge is fantastic. Breakfast and hors d’oeuvres have a large selection. Hazel looked after us very well in the lounge and was always very welcoming :) My only suggestion would be to upgrade the room access cards so they don’t deactivate every time it comes close to your phone. Will definitely be back.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: WORST MARRIOTT EVER
desc: I stayed at your hotel for 12 consecutive nights. When I asked to check out early and cancel the 13th night, you were still determined to charge me for the penalty?? Not to mention your inefficient service during my entire stay. Another thing, when your staff were chatting they speak Chinese, when I ask them for something, they say they only speak English??? What's with that?? Is it another inhuman hotel policy??

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Please have a quick read before booking, you’ll thank yourself later.
desc: Read this honest review before booking, I’m an expert in staying in different hotels so I know a thing or two about hotel quality. And this is definitely below average. It really questions who is really rating the statuses of these type of hotels. Don’t believe about the breakfast being amazing it’s below average lol, you can go to nearby to Suntec and have a $2.00-5.00 filling breakfast. features that they have a bidet and so has been a standard feature on the Fullerton hotel for years and many other hotels nearby. Fairmont hotel was amazing, the Fullerton Hotel is a must and a perfect location. Stay away from this hotel. I’d recommend this hotel for a backpacker or a stay that cost anywhere from $20-$50. Anything more you are just throwing your money away from the amazing

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent service, Great location, Superior Executive Lounge.
desc: The front desk Luna is extremely nice and accommodating. Fast early check-in was greatly appreciated. The executive lounge staff are the best! Hazel,Ren,Gab,Kay,Fatmah,and Prakas they work extremely hard to make guests feel at home. The food selections for breakfast, afternoon tea and dinner are all 5 starts👍👍( many only service snacks but here is back to pre-Covid)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding Lunch Banquet at JW Marriott The Grand Ballroom
desc: Overall experience was top notch. From our WC Chanel answering all our queries as and when, to Fauzil help for AV testing (finding disney-like BG, cater to our fonts) and on AD AV controls (music, lights and kahoots) and AD last minute changes and arrangement handled by BM Nuttee were to our extreme satisfaction. We have many customisation as we were doing a disney theme weddings so we gotten many helps. Firstly, was to change all their default items to disney. The BG, seating plans, decorations even wedding favours which we had brought in ourselves, they assisted us to place om the tables and the liaising with external vendors were prompt and all went smoothly. On AD, our "butler" also constantly update us on the status and help us with our dress and movements smoothly. For

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding Dinner
desc: We just had our wedding on 17 September 2022 at JW Marriott South Beach and the event was everything we hoped for. Our greatest thanks will have to go to Chanel Tan, the assistant director of events. She ensured that our experience was a positive and thoroughly reassuring one. She remained responsive, reliable and always accommodating our requests within the best of her capacity. She also remained professional throughout, attends to the smallest of details, and wears the most welcoming smile during all our meetings. She is truly someone whom I think Marriott needs to value as she is truly competent and capable, and this is not without backing. We first engaged Marriott for our wedding banquet dinner early 2021, and halfway there was a change of our liaison from Theresa to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the Best
desc: What can I say about this hotel? Having travelled the world staying in many "5" star hotels this really hits the mark, every aspect from Check in to check out was flawless, beautiful views from the room which are well maintained, housekeeping who take a great pride in their work, the Executive lounge is superb with a huge selection of food and beverages, the staff there, Hazel, Ren, John, Kay, Gab and Fatimah where a joy, nothing was too much trouble and their knowledge of Singapore made a very special holiday even more special. This is one of the best 5 Stars we have stayed in and is a credit to both the staff and Marriot and should be the benchmark that all other hotels should be judged against

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Back in Singapore for the F1, and back at the JW Marriott South Beach
desc: The JW Marriott at South Beach is one of the best hotels we've stayed at. It is located adjacent to the Esplanade MRT station, for easy access to the city, and the F1 course. The roof bar and pool actually overlook Turn 13 on the course ....... The hotel is modern, and impeccably maintained. The staff are professional, responsive, and friendly, and extremely customer focused. It's home to the best Executive Lounge that we've encountered in our JWM stays, which is accessible at no charge to higher end JWM rewards program members, and also to non members for a reasonable fee. There are excellent high end restaurants adjacent to the Hotel in the old Singapore Defense Forces NCO club, and also excellent more informal restaurnts in the open are plaza adjacent to the hotel (on

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Lovely hotel - shame that the attitude is so elitist!
desc: Lifetime Gold Elite (after 8 years as platinum Elite) - I felt like a pauper checking in on a points booking amongst the Prada Princesses during Grand Prix weekend. No recognition of my Marriott Bonvoy status, no upgrade to which I’m entitled (even though better rooms were available), generally aloof ‘you are lucky to be staying here’ attitude, no upsell of lounge access. The room was great - although where was turndown service and replenishment of coffee supplies? Amenities top notch. Design amazing. Prices sky high, location amazing especially pool overlooking GP track. No mention of floor 18 facilities closure during GO weekend. Lovely hotel but arrogant I’m afraid :(

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic Exec Club staff !
desc: The executive club is one of the best on the planet. Not only a great facility with quality food & beverages, but it was the people that made it stand out. Hazel, Lora, Revni, Parakas, Kay , Eman, Gabrriel, John and Lorraine all worked hard and with a great spirit of service which was very welcoming. I apologize if I mis-spelled any of the names. Great team and a great experience.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: First Trip Post-Covid July 2022
desc: After 3 years of covid, our family was finally able to travel during the summer so we decided to stay at the JW Marriott South Beach in Singapore. Hotel was very well maintained and clean. Breakfast had a vast array of food selection to choose from. Our room was spacious and clean and the pull out bed was great for our 2 kids. Hotel was conveniently located close to a mall and MBS!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good hotel in the heart of Singapore.
desc: Situated in the heart of the city, the hotel has all the amenities you would expect to see in a luxury brand like JW Marriott. Great buffet, outdoor pool at the top floor, decent gym, good concierge lounge as expected in brand hotels in Asia. Does it stand out from other luxury hotels in the city? no. But it has everything you expect to have. I stayed the week before the F1 race so you can see the stands being set up. I’d bet I can watch the race from the rooftop deck. Question is how much would the room rate be for the race week.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent for couples staycay
desc: Stayed at JW for weekend staycay with partner. Best JW property we’ve stayed at so far. Room was ready ahead of time, late check out made available on request. Special mention to the executive lounge staff who happily accommodated us after check-in through past tea time. Food and beverage choices were ample and staff were creative in offering to adapt drink choices from cocktails to non-alcoholic versions. Don’t miss out on the charcoal and otah buns! Thank you to Cora, Hazel, and the rest of the team for perfecting out stay.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: NIce hotel at a good location
desc: Stayed 3 days in the hotel for the first time I tried this new JW. It is a nice hotel and the location very convenient. Staff were friendly, rooms are clean and all seems to be organized. Good equipped gym and nice view from the outdoor place at the 18th floor. The only point I find disappointing is the pool. There is one on the 18th without any deck chair but only some wooden benches which reminds me on the school swimming pool. There is a second pool in the building next door (east tower) which you can reach via a bridge. Large area (ok size pool for a city hotel) but very unpractical designed. The designer wanted a stylish solution for that area which is not very comfortable and also NO deckchair for sun bathing (except 3-4 in the water) . Overall it feels like a restaurant

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Above and beyond! Hazel and Cora in the lounge were superstars!
desc: Just WOW...I knew I'd love this hotel as I'd read multiple reviews and watched endless videos of happy guests. The room was spacious with breathtaking views of the bay as expected. What I didn't expect was just how memorable the executive lounge staff would make our visit. Hazel and Cora took care of every need, were kind to answer some of our questions about the area, gave awesome tips, and even remembered our favorite drinks over our 4 day stay. We were lucky enough to enjoy the exec lounge's first day of full breakfast service, and it will be the reason I always come back to the JW while in Singapore!! Great selection of foods and drinks in the quiet of the lounge (the usual breakfast buffet was delicious but bustling). We were warmly greeted by Hazel who offered our

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott - Great Service at Executive Lounge
desc: I travelled to Singapore for a business trip and had an amazing stay at JW Marriot. Staff was extremely friendly, especially the staff managing the executive lounge. A special acknowledgement to Hazel and Lorainne who went above and beyond with their services and reccomendation diring our stay. I highly reccomend staying at the JW and choosing a room with lounge access.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: First impressions
desc: Just arrived. Looks like a nice hotel and everyone welcoming. As an Ambassador Elite was upgraded to a family room however since it is my sister and I preferred two beds (sorry but not interested in sleeper sofa). Only rooms were normal (premium twin beds). It’s disappointing that a hotel this size doesn’t offer two doubles or queens. Hoped for a high floor with a view but no luck there. Executive lounge looks nice and everyone is very smiling and accommodating. Will update as trip progresses in facilities. They recommend a reservation for breakfast or take your chances as a walk in. First Marriott I have seen where they do this. Not sure if it’s Covid related or due to size.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: THE hotel to stay at in SIN
desc: The JW Marriott ist THE place to stay in Singapore. Very conveniently located. Great rooms. A very generous Happy Hour in the executive lounge (yes, I do realize that this not a standard offering) and an unbeatable breakfast. I did stay at quite some other hotels in Singapore before. But the JWM is definitely the one to return to .

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Not that great......
desc: We stayed here for two nights and treated ourselves to an Executive suite mainly because we wanted to enjoy the executive lounge which had such great reviews from others but our experience was different - more of that later. The suite rooms were great, large corner bedroom with magnificent views from the floor to ceiling windows over Marina area, unfortunately the views were spoiled by great big TV set in front of the window! lovely comfortable bed with a sofa on one side. Huge bathroom with bath and two washbasins and beautiful views again , could see all the way down to padang and MBS. However the bathroom doors were extremely heavy to use, had to really push them hard with my whole body to open or shut them, quite dangerous really as a young child could get crushed in them

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: SSR god-tier soul food at Beach Road Kitchen
desc: The service provided here is awesome uwu.The food is great,especially the Salmon Wellington nya.The people here are extremely friendly desu,for example Simon who served me the amazing Americano coffee poi poi.The chefs here are also really delicate and are really impeccable in their divine food craft,and the waiters and the waitresses are really professional people,exceeded my own expectations.The bellman-concierge at the hotel who manages taxi arrivals and departures are also very nice to us pafu pafu ~ will definitely come back for the food,sometime later o//

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Rooms are very nice, but service is extremely inefficient and breakfast has a long waiting time
desc: We went on a short stay-cation to celebrate our anniversary, we arrived at 4:00 pm to the hotel, we did online check-in, which didn't serve any purpose as anyway you have to go through the front desk. We were 3rd in line and waited 30 mins! I have no idea what the front desk personnel are doing to check-in/check-out guests, but it is extremely inefficient. It was already 4:45 pm when they finalized our check-in and the lady in the front desk told us our room was not ready yet! (check-in is supposed to be at 3 pm). I told her we needed to rest and to please help us to hurry up. She made a couple of calls and we waited for 20 more minutes until it was ready. The room was very nice with a great view, but too cold (air-con set at 18 C). The next day we went for breakfast and even

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Lovely staycation
desc: Booked the premier suite as a treat as no plans to travel out of country so soon. And happy to report that the experience is excellent. The executive lounge is great too. All the staff we encountered are attentive and friendly, ready with smiles and greetings making us feel so welcomed. Would like to especially compliment Mr Talgat at the Front Office and Ms Hazel at the Executive Lounge. Will not hesitate to return and look forward to staying at other JW Marriott properties in the future.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Enjoyed the visit
desc: Visited the lounge with my friend and had a great time. The drinks and food were good. Hazel is an excellent staff. A pure gem to the hotel. We came here expecting top tier service and she aced it and surpassed our expectations. My stay here was the best experience I've had in Singapore so far. Thank you Hazel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Decent staycation
desc: Booked a room for my husband birthday. Enjoy the club access and the selection of high tea, wines and cocktails. Hazel from the club demonstrated the epitome of great service’s and . Always delightful, warm and eager to make our time at the club better. A tad disappointed that despite my booking 6 months ago, request for high floor wasn’t granted. And not even a 30 min later den 12noon check out was granted. Professional service But rather impersonal service by all except Hazel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great spot in Singapore
desc: Great location, beautiful views of the city. We were thrilled with our stay. The executive lounge is wonderful. The kindest and most attentive staff, especially Hazel and Karthik! Hazel made sure we knew the best places to eat and see. We loved Chef Raymond who made us wonderful egg dishes every morning of our stay. Thanks for taking such great care of us and making us feel at home.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Home away from home in Singapore
desc: I just returned from a wonderful stay at this JW and wanted to share my experience. The property is well situated with an easy walk, cab or train to many of the city’s desirable neighborhoods. It is well designed and maintained but what sets it apart is the staff. Front front desk to engineering to housekeeping, all were responsive and provided great service. The very best was the superior service of the Food and Beverage staff, especially in the Executive Lounge. Hazel and the rest of the folks went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and well cared for throughout our stay. They remembered our preferences and definitely went the extra mile to make us feel at home. I can’t wait to return to this property to see our new friends at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: The Food Services staff makes this hotel great
desc: My husband and I enjoyed 6 days at the JW Marriott. The hotel is beautiful and centrally located, but what really sets it apart from other beautiful hotels where we have stayed during our travels is the exceptional staff in the Executive Lounge. Simply put, they were amazing! Hazel, Kartik, Gab, Fatimah, Ren, Kay and John are fantastic at their jobs, going above and beyond to make all feel welcome. Thank you all so much! Hazel and Kartik especially extended themselves in ensuring that we had everything that we needed and treated us like friends. I’d read reviews about the property in making a decision to stay there and the Executive Lounge staff did not disappoint! I also have to mention the exceptional service of Praveen and Kady at the Beach Road Kitchen. Praveen was very

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A wonderful stay and one of the best Marriott Executive Lounges
desc: This hotel has so much going for it. In addition to its stunning architecture, they are wonderful people, in a great location with easy access to the Metro. The housekeeping was reliable, there’s a bountiful breakfast, and it has one of the best Executive Lounges I’ve experienced. A significant part of what makes the lounge so great is Hazel…..so warm and endearing. Made you not want to leave.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great location and stunning views
desc: JW is usually a right bet. This Norman Foster building is very comfortable regardless of the amazing bet on design. The views over Marina Bay and CBD are stunning. 18th floor Swiming pool and the food offer Inside and on the Esplanade Mall Below is great

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay, excellent service
desc: Had a staycation at the Deluxe Suite to celebrate our Wedding Anniversary. We enjoyed the accommodation very much and love the service provided by Hazel / Kay at the Executive Lounge. Also a special shout out to front desk manager Jacqueline Wong for being so thoughtful in sending a cake and handwritten card when she realised my birthday is coming next week (we did not inform the hotel at all). We had a great time at JW and would highly recommend this hotel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Disappointing stay at Hip hotel in revitalized South Beach road precinct
desc: Had a disappointing stay at the Marriott. The room although modern felt small, and somewhat dark. Would strongly suggest booking rooms on the higher floors, with better natural light and views (such as featured on their website) The lobby area felt narrow and cold, & surprised by the minuscule bathrooms off the lobby. Buffet Breakfast is decent at the Beach road cafe, and there is a wide range of restaurants in the vicinity. Didn’t stay long enough to explore the area

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best Hotel Gym in Singapore, Recreation supervisor top notch
desc: The hotel gym has everything you need and is clean and spacious it has a variety of free weights and machines. Special thanks to Andrew the recreation supervisor who is helpful, diligent, professional and makes you feel very special. In fact this is my first time experience hotel that have high experience associate like Andrew who is very expert in bodybuilding and fitness, totally a game changer. Probably I would like to suggest the hotel to add leg extension machine, prone leg curl with squat rack to enhance guest experience. Thank you Andrew and definitely will stay with this hotel again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Andrew the recreation supervisor
desc: I recently had the pleasure of staying in you hotel for 11 nights. I found the whole experience exceptional. I would like to particularly single out Andrew the recreation supervisor who works in the fitness center. His customer centric approach and attention to detail was world class and he is a tremendous asset for the hotel. I do a significant amount of travel and I’m a diamond member with Hilton. However the experience I had while staying in the hotel will make me stay in the Marriott hotel chain more often.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent hotel
desc: The JW Marriott is a wonderful hotel and in an excellent position to enjoy the many delights of Singapore. The rooms are spacious and nicely appointed. The rooms were very clean and regularly made up early and quickly each day. As always, the staff truly make a great hotel and the JW Marriott has some excellent employees. The staff at the executive lounge, especially Hazel, are wonderful and are extremely professional and accommodating despite some guests being quite rude. Lia at the pool bar is also excellent, attentive and friendly. Nothing was too much trouble and our drinks were always very nice. Finally, Sabrina at the front desk was efficient, friendly and very professional upon our arrival after a long flight. Again, she was very accommodating and had a

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Nice clean
desc: Clean and a nice large room there was no noise despite being on a main road . It was good to sleep lifts to be able to use for luggage . not too far out of town restaurants close by shopping centre a few blocks away but near transport for ease of use.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Truly the BEST hotel in every aspect !!!
desc: This was our fourth stay at this hotel and we could never think about staying ANYWHERE else other than this property whenever we visit Singapore. The location is perfect , right across from the famous Raffles Hotel, close to all the amazing malls and restaurants and directly above the Esplanade MRT Station. We got upgraded to a beautiful Suite on arrival due to our Platinum Elite Marriott Bonvoy status which also included access to the beautiful Executive Lounge. The suite had a phenomenal view of the entire city. The staff at the Executive Lounge certainly went above and beyond the call of duty to make us feel welcomed with a special appreciation to Cora (Lounge Manager ) Hazel, Gabriel, Renz, Kay, John & Prakash.The entire staff at The Beach Kitchen deserves an

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Bonvoy business lounge experience and hotel are excellent
desc: I visited this hotel 1 year ago and had the royal treatment from Hazel in the lounge every morning for breakfast. She is very professional, friendly and attentative and wants to make your dining experience as best as possible. I’m visiting again 1 year later and she remembered me and made me feel welcomed instantly. Well done Hazel and your lovely team. Great hotel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Extremely Attentive
desc: We stayed at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach. The staff members who handle the executive lounge (Cora, Ren, Gab and Hazel) did a wonderful job and were extremely attentive to every detail. We appreciate their professionalism and hard work to provide us with an excellent experience. We were very impressed and the staff were welcoming and courteous. The fabulous, JW Marriott Singapore South beach offers a wonderful ambiance, professional staff and a quality experience. We love the room it's spacious, clean and super comfortable and all amenities. On this trip it seems that even greater efforts were made to ensure that we enjoyed our stay!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Not a luxury JW brand
desc: Not a bad hotel but cannot be luxury brand or JW brand. I felt the service and facilities included room designs dont seem like JW standard compared to other JWs in the world. Room itself is very tiny with very basic amenities and facilities which is definitely not the luxury as well as room designs may not be followed by JW standard of “mindfulness” which shows in their website. Bathroom is large enough but again, very basic design and looks cheap as well as cleanliness is unfortunately not met my expectation.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful hospitality!
desc: Stayed again at the JW Southbeach. Shout out to the lovely Filipinos at the executive lounge - Hazel, Sara, Cora, Gab, Ren and their lovely intern Yee Ann and to all the staff. Thank you for your warm hospitality, all your hard work and welcoming attitude. You made my stay enjoyable once again. @ JW, please support the staff and reward them for their dedication and commitment.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great service and good view at JW
desc: I really enjoyed the stay at JW and this is my second time staying here. The hotel room is clean and with a good view of Singapore city. The staff is very friendly, particularly Hazel, Cora and Kay for their very warm welcoming. Their services are excellent and make you feel very comfortable and relax. I would also like to thanks all other staff who have severed me while my stay

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Impressive customer service
desc: The warm, genuine, attentive customer service was impeccable! The staff remembered our name. And greeted us with a smile. Always professional with outstanding attention to detail. We stayed over the F1 Grand Prix weekend. We could see the cars & track from EBB 6- excellent view!! We also had a view of the track & stage from our room. Decadent room & bed. Fun location in the city. We used the lounge. The best food in a hotel lounge we’ve ever experienced. I have a long list of food intolerances and they took very good care of me. Chef Jerome cooked a delicious specific breakfast daily for me. Host Hazel made the lounge feel like being welcomed into a friend’s home. Rose at the EBB6 pool was very attentive and kind. The staff made our hotel stay very special.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Our Favoritr Hotel in Singapore
desc: Balancing historic heritage with contemporary style, JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach offers unrivaled luxury in the downtown Singapore city center, near Marina Bay, the Central Business District and leading attractions including National Stadium & National Gallery. Find your respite in immaculate designer-appointed hotel accommodations with elegant interiors, 5-star amenities & sleek, marble bathrooms. JW Marriott at South Beach Road is our Favorite hotel in Singapore. Just this year, we visited 3 times! And still planning to go back by December. There are several reasons why we keep on coming back. 1. Excellent service - From the bellman, receptionist, housekeeping, spa, restaurants, everyone is just topnotch. They know us. They remember us. 2. Great Food -

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott Singapore
desc: Great hotel - central location close to Marina Bay, Gardens and all the must see attractions in Singapore. Fantastic staff - so friendly and attentive. A special thanks to Hazel who helped my wife to get to the places we wanted to see and made suggestions for places to visit during our stay. I have to say our stay at the JW was perfect.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Staycation - Executive Lounge
desc: Our staycation has one greatest memory ..... be pampered! & pampered! & more pampered! All the staff at Executive Lounge go beyond their duties to make guests so welcomed and taken care. Often asking if we had enough and kept serving us. We are so filled with food & drinks but more importantly with warmth from the staff. Hazel will cap it off by reminding us to visit JW Marriott South Beach in our next staycation. A bunch of great staff who are asset to the hotel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay at JW Marriott
desc: Had an enjoyable staycation with my group of friends at JW Marriott. Central location with lots of shopping and food choices that you will be spoilt for. Besides, the friendliness and professionalism of the staff never fails to disappoint every time I'm there! The Executive Lounge food was amazing, especially the Salted Chocolate tart which is my personal favourite. Not to mention, Cora and Hazel's service was top notch and personalised. They ensure your taste buds are well taken care of and make sure you leave the lounge with a smile on your face. Be sure to look for them when you're there! Definitely would recommend 10/10!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great room and fantastic club lounge experience
desc: Had an awesome stay at the JW Marriott South Beach. The room was big, very clean, and the view of the city was great. The pool and view is also amazing, although the water can be quite cold in the evening. We had a splendid time in the executive lounge as well. Their tea selection was nice and the service provided by Cora, Hazel and team was superb. Will definitely recommend the hotel to others.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great service from Mandy and Cherie
desc: Mandy and Cherie gave the best customer service I have experienced. She was helpful. The service is smooth and straightforward. Information was accurate and clear for me to make informed decisions quickly. Great cutomer support from beginning to end of the process.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Customer Journey (Wedding Banquet)
desc: My wife and I hosted our wedding lunch banquet at JW Marriot Singapore on 8 Oct 22. The service provided Dickson (Event Sales Manager) and his team (e.g. Nutt and Belle) was absolutely amazing from the start to the end. Truly a pleasant customer journey experience. In particular, Dickson was very professional and patient with us despite all the queries and requests that we had. Without a doubt, he provided first class service, going above and beyond his scope of work. Couldn't be more thankful and appreciative of the team! Best regards Zheng Da

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Love this hotel- glad to retirn
desc: My favorite hotel for business travel. This was my first visit/ stay since September 2019 due to COVID restrictions. It is so nice to be back and see old friends- Hazel in the executive lounge and Sara who always welcomes me at the door! Also made some new friends including Yee Ann, in the lounge. Everyone is so kind and helpful. This is important when being away from home for weeks on end. I love this hotel for the hospitality, comfortable rooms, delicious breakfast and awesome pool for an after work swim. I would highly recommend this hotel when you visit Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Come for the location but stay for the fantastic service
desc: The highlight of my recent business trip was my stay at the JW Marriott. I had the fortune/misfortune of having my trip overlap with the Singapore F1 Race, but the JW Marriott exceeded my expectations. Even though over 300,000 people were in town for the race, the JW felt like an oasis. The room was great, but the service made the stay stand out. Specifically, Hazel in the Executive lounge was excellent. She exudes warmth while delivering five-star service. I can say with confidence that she was the highlight of my stay and why I will always choose the JW Marriott when I come back for work or pleasure.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay!!! The Best Executive Lounge!
desc: We had a great stay here at JW Marriott in Singapore! The service is amazing as expected but the crew at the executive lounge here has exceeded our expectations. Hazel is the best! Look for her when you get there. She has provided us with top-notch and world class service. She was very attentive and warm, she made us feel very welcome and at home which is what you need when you are away from home. Renz, the executive lounge supervisor, was also very accomodating and informative. He made sure that we were taken care of. Cora, Gabriel and Yee-Ann have also went above and beyond to make sure that we have the best experience. We will come back here for sure! We loved the food, 10/10! Amazing quality, not a typical buffet. The lounge is very clean and the food is fresh. Thank you JW

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding banquet, wedding stay and suite review
desc: The grand ballroom is one of the most magical place to hold a wedding in the entire Singapore. The wedding package is a comprehensive package that includes wedding food, AV system (sound system is also super good btw), florals, gift & invitation, stay, parking and many more. All my guest were impressed at the wedding venue and explained that everything is perfect! Special mention to the wedding coordinator Dickson (amazing man who worked wonders) and his team, Neilson, Eugene and Razak for turning my anxiety from a foe to a friend. No words could explain how good their service in, giving me advices and suggestion to achieve perfection for my wedding! Professional, detail oriented, friendly and delightful team. Wedding suite and hotel team were great too, hotel buffet is

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful Stay at JW Marriott Singapore
desc: My friends and I had an amazing time staying over at this property. The staff are friendly and check-in was seamless. Everybody is so friendly and big shout out to the front desk team. Thank you for the wonderful stay! Will definitely recommend to all!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Club Lounge
desc: Very nice hotel, clean and comfortable rooms in the middle of the action, 30 minute walk from Marina Bay. Not much interaction with hotel staff on the main level, but in the executive lounge there is a personal concetion, Hazel at the Club Lounge is the absolute best!!! She pays attention to what I like to eat and drink and makes great conversation.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Vegas Like
desc: If you like Vegas this place is for you. Lots of lights and show pieces. The front staff is new so they are still learning. BUT the lounge is where the hospitality is! Hazel remembered my name, my drinks, my likes and dislikes after the first day. She really made me feel like a wanted guest. The lounge has food that changes nightly, both hot and cold food. It also has a made to order noodle bar. As for the morning there is a great veriaty of all kinds of foods from around the world to help keep your at home routine. It's close to shopping so there is lots to do and a lot to eat. When traveling on the weekends be sure to make dinner reservations for every establishment is booked for the night. Oh yeah the pool view is amazing!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Hotel
desc: My first stay with this hotel was totally outstanding. From smooth check in at the lobby till my first step in the room, was perfect! The poolside view were marvelous and this hotel have 2 swimming pool, with a great gym. Special thanks especially to Andrew and all his team at the recreation. Andrew service is very professional and he is like walking gym encyclopedia that full of fitness knowledge. Definitely will return to this wonderful hotel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: That Lounge...
desc: I booked this hotel based on past reviews and used points to cover the room rate for several days. The location is ideal for access to bus tours, a mall, and is above the metro for access to other parts of the island. The views from the pool deck are not to be missed but the water is a little cold! As a Titanium Elite, I was provided Executive Lounge access…I never wanted to leave! We spent significant time in the Lounge starting with breakfast, afternoon tea and evening canapes, which easily turned into dinner a few nights after long days of sightseeing. Hazel is a superstar and made us feel at home with her hospitality. Even though she wore a mask, it was easy to tell she was smiling with every interaction. The entire lounge staff was superb (Kay, Gab and Ren) and the food was

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay and service!
desc: Had a wonderful stay at the JW Marriott South Beach Singapore. Remarkable service from check in to check out. I would like the highlight Miss Moon, our housekeeping attendant for providing us with outstanding service. She left us a personalized and thoughtful note. Thank you for an amazing stay!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Perfect Location, Great Views, and Amazing Lounge
desc: We had an amazing stay at the JW Marriott after wanting to take a break from the Sands this trip. The location allowed us to walk to Atlas Bar and Raffles Hotel, which were at the top of our list. The pools were great, with fantastic views of the city. To top it all off, Hazel and the team in the lounge made our experience unforgettable. We will definitely be back!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Where service counts!
desc: The location is perfect for sightseeing since the Big Bus tour HQ is right across the street. You can also walk to many of the sites like the Merlion and with luck, as we had, a perfect view of the bay from our room. The best part of the stay was Hazel and her team (Ren, Gab, Elysia, Qiyi, and John) in the executive lounge. You will never be hungry or thirsty! I've seen several mentions on other reviews and they deserve all the praise.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: HAZEL the true GEM!
desc: Well, was about to leave a compliment for Hazel but scroll through the reviews and saw a lot of compliments on Hazel. That’s what I call it consistent excellent service! Definitely a someone who bring a great experience and memory to stay in JW Marriott. We had a pleasure tea time and evening cocktail with her joyous personality and great conversation. She even surprise us with a cocktail which taste the most refreshing cocktail I ever drank, simply amazing! Definitely coming back because of Hazel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best executive lounge ever, thanks Hazel!
desc: If you are a business traveler, the executive lounge here makes this hotel an absolute must! Our host Hazel always took care of us for breakfast, tea, drinks. Hosts like her truly make this a 5-star experience. The pool and views are wonderful, and the location is unbeatable. The service is always top notch and the hotel and rooms are very well appointed.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Just OK for the price - more business hotel than staycation
desc: Background- just moved to singapore, we're trying a new hotel once a month. Husband is 4nights away from Marriott Platinum, so we're trying this hotel Overall 5star New rooms & bathroom with a toto toilet (the ritz carlton deluxe marine bay view had old toilets with no bidet!), great location- MRT, raffles, suntec vity, chijmes, etc 3star Freezing cold & small 18th floor pool Window view is meh, unless on a high floor Food at the pool is just ok (save your money) and takes 40min 1 star No proper coffee maker - instant coffee REALLY ???? NO turn-down service It's the morning of our first night (staying 2 nights), and can't comment on the food yet ** but i will say the Ritz Carlton Club has excellent free flow champagne, fantastic views, even if the furniture was looking a

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding Weekend
desc: My wife and I had our wedding there and it was beyond amazing. Everything from the food/rooms to the wedding was perfect. I would like to thank the brilliant teams/staffs (Chanel, Neilsen, Eugene, Chef Raymond and his kitchen team). They made the night special for us and accommodated or guest whole heartedly. They also catered to all our requests and executed the perfect wedding for us. Will highly recommend this hotel thanks to them and also the amazing facilities and staffs.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Marriot Gym Members
desc: During my 2 month stay at the JW Marriot, I had the opportunity to meet the best hotel employees. Andrew and Burhan made sure to give me and my friends the upmost respect we could get. The hotel gym is one of the best I've been to thanks to them. Though it could us an upgrade with bigger dumbells, prone leg curls, and leg extensions. Other than that, I am hoping to stay at JW again to see Burhan and Andrew.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful stay & experience to have my wedding hosted @ JW Marrriott
desc: Thank you to JW Team for the support given during my wedding on 22/11/22. Everything from management to the staff down at work in the ballroom was very prompt and helpful. My guests are happy and delighted to have attended this wedding. Special mention to Nutthee, the main guy on the floor we are communicating with. Thank you for attending to our sudden request & always taking initiative to inform & checking on us to ensure our event flow runs well. Kudos to you. Best wishes from the Newly Wed Couple on 22/11/22 @ JW Marriot SG

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing property, staff, amenities, and location
desc: Our recent 5-night stay at the JW Marriott South Beach was almost perfect in every way. The property is modern and beautiful, with sculptures and fountains outdoors and mirrors and lights indoors. Fixtures are all premium, and there is excellent attention to detail in everything the staff does, from bell boys to housekeeping to lounge staff. The views from the pool on the 18th floor are breathtaking, and it seems that the entire city is a short walk away. The executive lounge was wonderful, and Hazel stood out in particular with ensuring that we were always comfortable and our drinks were always full. Food offerings were all high quality, with a rotating and wide selection of offerings. In our 5 days, we didn't need to try the same dish twice, although some were so good we

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best business travel experience ever!
desc: Service at this location was top notch ! From the moment I stepped on the property I was well taken care of. The front desk staff as well as the concierge are extremely kind, professional and accommodating. My favorite part of the stay was the incredible family like atmosphere that is created in the lounge. The staff knew my name , remembered what I liked to drink , made sure I didn’t miss a snack and made me feel so welcomed. Hazel was incredible ! I felt like I had know her my whole life! The other team members including Karthik, Qiyi, Gab, Fatima and Elysia were wonderfully kind and helpful. I would highly recommend this property to anyone traveling in the Singapore area. It will for sure be your home away from home!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Modern, Aesthetic and great lounge service!
desc: Room is spacious enough and has everything you need. Very comfortable. Modern, aesthetic and highly instagrammable in every corner. We have executive lounge access which is sooo worth it every time. We stayed here in 2018 and we’re super happy to be back. Pro-tip: If you ever visit, get lounge access and look for these amazing lounge executives (Ate Hazel, Cora, John & Ren) who took great care of us during our stay. Always the best! Thank you!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Come for the location. Stay for the executive lounge!
desc: I chose this hotel over the Ritz Carlton because of the amazing reviews of the executive lounge and was in no way disappointed. Hazel, Gab, and Kay, were amazing. Just as everyone noted, Hazel is immediately everyone’s best friend. She quickly knew my name, my story, and made me feel like part of her family. The food and service in the lounge were spectacular too. Hotel rooms are very nice but small. The hotel amenities were great too. Beautiful roof pool but boy was it chilly. Would not hesitate to stay here again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Location, and Super Friendly Staff
desc: Would highly recommend the JW Marriott for both business and leisure travel. It is super well located - only a few minutes by taxi to the business district, and without walking distance to restaurants and bars. The staff member, and especially the Executive Lounge staff members, are incredibly attentive - and especially Hazel - thank you!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Modern & Conveniently Located
desc: Had a wonderful stay at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach for 4 nights. A bit skeptical about the location of the hotel at first, as we never stayed in this area previously however the hotel is actually very conveniently located near 2 MRT station (City Hall & Esplanade) and within walking distance to 3 major malls (Marina Square, Raffles City & Suntec). Room despite a bit smaller if compared to other JW Marriott, is modernly decorated and clean. The interior of the hotel is a bit different than the usual JW Marriott, it is a bit similar with W Hotels as it is ultra modern . Staffs are friendly and always willing to help without being too unobtrusive. Recommended hotel as it is conveniently located.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best lounge ever . . .
desc: Best executive lounge of any JW we've stayed in. Hazel, Sarah, John and Fatima all made us feel very special. Also, food at the lounge was some of the best we've had. Our room was very nice, although we found the bedside tables rather small and we never found a safe. Also, we would suggest that Marriott put a plug in the bathroom for a razor or personal hairdryer.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Perfectly located
desc: Hotel is clean and fragrant (I can't get the lovely smell of the lobby out of my mind). Location is key to all hotels. This one is located very close to the MRT, making exploration of the city an ease. Craving late night eats? There's an entire plaza of pubs right downstairs. Need to get your shopping fix? There's a mall within a few minutes of walking. Staff is responsive and attentive, just don't expect any additional bonuses with Marriott status.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Hotel with a personal touch!
desc: The JW Marriott has always been one of my favorites, the Singapore location takes it up a notch in so many ways! If you happen to get in the Executive Lounge, you will be pleasantly surprised by the staff. One that stood out for us is Hazel! She was so pleasant, courteous and attentive. She definitely takes it up on another level!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great property, fantastic location, impeccable staff and attention to detail!
desc: Perfect view of the Singapore Marina, walking distance to all of the important things to see, and a cheerful staff that's always there to help and make sure you're taken care of. Specifically, Hazel, Kay, and QiYi in the Executive Lounge provided great service throughout my stay -- even down to remembering preferences after the first interaction!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Very nice stay, best pastries !!!
desc: Verr nice stay definitely will be back again next time Pros - Nice, clean room, all staff were were very pleasant and helpful( front/ housekeeping/ breakfast / club lounge/ gym) -Hotels Accommodate my requests that I emailed beforehand. -Food was very good and variety especially at breakfast/ club lounge - Pastries here were the best in all Marriott hotels & resorts that I had stayed so far, really love it. You should try especially in club lounge. - Club lounge staffs were very attentive especially Hazel, Kay, Joh, Ren, Gab. Cons -Pool should be used heated water, it was to cool to swim

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Home away from home
desc: I do enjoy staying at the JW and special mention to Hazel from the lounge who makes the effort to remember guests and makes u feel welcome everytime u return to stay again. It's business as usual now and despite being busier than ever, they do make the effort to make us feel welcome. Although I must say they did do a good job even when I was there for my SHN stay during covid.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott Wedding 26th Dec 2022 Victor & Charmaine
desc: To Thana, Maran, Syazwan, Fauzi, Raymond and our beloved Laura❤️ We recognized your effort and sincerity in assisting us in our big day. We went through many weddings before and there was always at least few problematic messed ups here and there. This wedding in JW Marriott was absolutely FLAWLESS, Fabulous, flamboyant and fantastic. Couldn’t have done it without all of the help from you guys. 5 star review was an understatement. It was amazing thanks once again

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW SPA
desc: Did an aromatherapy massage here, Mandy tended to me, was a good massage overall, just a note that there’s no foot bath here prior to massage. Kristin from spa front desk was very attentive/ polite/ service oriented, gave me a mini tour of the beautiful space before my session since I was early. Very clean space, with facilities for bathing + sauna if you like after the session. Thanks!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Poor quality control, vacation turned into wasted evening full of issues
desc: During our last visit to Singapore earlier this year we drove by the JW Marriott a number of times and dined in nearby restaurants as we thought it would be a nice hotel to stay at for our holiday visit; especially being a luxury Marriott brand. Sadly, the hotel portion of our stay has been stressful; filled with disappointment and problems. We still have two more nights here yet today we were moved to a total of 4 different rooms. Our first room was a Premier bedroom on the 7th floor. We had two main concerns with this room (1) the state of the room had serious cleanliness issues such as the mold/mildew around bathroom drains, room showing signs of recent repairs to the paint job with different colors and some of it peeling, and other signs of needing more attention by

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Underwhelming & overpriced
desc: On the plus side it is a modern hotel perfectly located for all the main sights. However it lacks the basics … rooms not cleaned properly, breakfast menu limited and not rotated & most of all a lack of emphasis on customer service. The litmus test for this is on check out they will never ask you how your stay was because they don’t want to know. We had reason to speak to management during our stay but they couldn’t be bothered to follow up or return our call. If you are vegetarian or vegan (concerned about cross contamination) you will go hungry here. It is expensive & if you have the budget to stay in a top end hotel then there is plenty of choice I would suggest picking somewhere else. Having stayed in a lot of Marriotts can say this is not one that I would return to.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay over the holidays!
desc: The hotel location is fantastic. Next door is Raffles and on the other side is Suntec where you can pick up the tours -- MRT is on your doorstep as well as walking distance to the Marina square or Arab street/Chjimes. Our check in with Derrick was great, He gave us a great room (2013) which was very spacious with a couch in the hallway it was that big. Lovely bathroom, firm bed, great view of Marina Bay Sands. We stayed at MBS for two nights before staying here and had some trepidation but it exceeded our expectations - the beds were much better at JW Marriott in our opinion. The staff were all very welcoming and very helpful. Executive lounge under Hazel and her team was fantastic - choice of food, cleanliness and attention to detail was not missed - they all went out of

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Everything's great except the room I got
desc: I stayed 2 nights and was upgraded to a suite. The suite is located in a different building with a connected short walkway. I think the building I was in are only suites and the highest floor to rooms are the 5th. I was kind of disappointed as I missed the high floor view around the area. I guess it was the small slab of stones in the living room area that formed the coffee table, it didn't give a cosy feeling and was cold in the room despite I raised the temperature. It was also a little inconvenient to get to the breakfast place or ground floor as you need to get into 2 elevators. 1 within the suite building going to the 1st floor, then walking the short 20 metre walkway and the next on the main building elevator to go from 1st to ground floor. Food at executive lounge and

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding at JW Marriot
desc: We had our wedding at JW Marriot Hotel on 26 Dec 2022. A special shoutout to our wedding coordinator Dickson, Nielson (the banquet manager) and their team who have been providing excellent service up till our actual day. My guests were full of praises on the venue as well as the service provided during that day. They said that the staff at the tables were always attentive and made sure that their cups were never empty. Dickson has been a great wedding coordinator and we are really glad to have him as our WC. He was always quick with his replies to our queries even while he is on leave. So, if you get Dickson as your WC, rest assured that you will be in good hands. Nielson was our banquet manager for the actual day. He made sure to check in on us to make sure my husband and I

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent stay at well situated JW Marriott Singapore
desc: Had a late check in at 3am. Front desk was still well staffed to cater for late arriving guests. Elite benefits were offered and check in was done promptly. A highlight of the stay will that be of the excellent service by Hazel and team at the Executive Lounge. Visited the bar during my stay that offered a wide range of gin, and also bespoke cocktails that were well received by the guests. Look forward to my next stay at this property.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best hotel in Singapore- For both business and resort
desc: 1st trip back since COVID to JW Marriott Singapore and couldn't have had a better visit. Key staff remembered me by name even though I haven't been there since Jan 2019. This is a unique property which blends the best of a business and resort. Special thanks to Hazel and Sarah L in the executive lounge (along with Gab, Qiyi, Ren, John, Fatima, Yee An and Cora) for making the stay great. Also thanks to Tak at the front desk for the fabulous upgrade. The JW doesn't take any Marriott Bonvoy Suite Upgrades but their local policy is by far better than that program which has almost zero availability. I would highly recommend this property. Very convenient to many locations. 2 pools and of course the fabulous Exec Lounge.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best JW Marriott I've ever stayed at
desc: The wife and I stayed here in Dec 22. for 4 nights. Hotel was amazing, as titanium elite the hotel offered me an upgraded room with view of Marina Bay. They even offered to move me to a suite on the second night of my stay as it was not available on the first night. We opted to stay in our room with the view, room was great bed and linens were very comfortable. Bathroom was spacious with separate tub and rain shower. But the view of the marina bay at night and day is what makes this property special. The free breakfast for titanium in the restaurant was amazing. So much variety and selection we enjoyed the breakfast every morning. The lounge was great as well with a lot of free snacks and coffee all day with great service. Highly recommend to anyone especially Marriott elites.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Almost great if they start it off right.
desc: The JW is definitely one of the more unique properties in Singapore. When you have the likes of Marina Bay Sands nearby you would think it would be hard to compete but JW offers a compelling enough stay to warrant a look. We had a suite booked for the duration of our stay over the new years. Unfortunately the stay started off on a sour note when we were told our room was not ready despite us arriving well past 3pm checkin. Not what you would expect from a premium suite experience. This coupled with over an hour wait did not kick off the right atmosphere. That said the rest of the stay was smooth and enjoyable. The pool and views from the suites are some of the best in SG. The breakfast at beach road kitchen is truly one of the most extensive layouts we have come across.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Must do the Executive Lounge
desc: Fantastic location! Fantastic views from the 21st floor. Stunning views from the pool. Well equipped gym. The executive lounge was next level! Food was amazing especially on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. What makes the executive lounge even more special and memorable is the service you receive from Hazel and her team Fatima, Gab, Yeean, Ren and Kay. You are all so amazingly attentive, accommodating and genuine and we would return purely because of you!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Pretty and modern hotel lacking basic hospitality
desc: Very new and clean property. The whole hotel gives me a bit of a grand and fancy property vibe with the esplanade train connection and number of good restaurants on the basement floor. This hotel has a 5-star location, with 5-star equivalent surrounding amenities, and a 5-star hotel exterior design. The one priority I had when booking the hotel was to have an automatic and heated bidet, which this hotel does offer, thankfully. However, that’s all that I found that was positive. The lobby is very narrow making it prone to traffic jams, the service at the front desk is quite slow. I think the front desk might've not appreciated my late arrival due to an almost 2.5 hour flight delay - because I was placed in a room below the roof line, where pool-goers have a direct line of sight

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Impeccable service
desc: JW Marriott South is a must-stay for any traveler. This charming hotel is a welcome pit-stop for anyone looking for first-rate hospitality. In fact, special shout-out for Hazel and her team - Elyssa, Kay, Ren, Qiyi, Yee An and Gab. They will go out of their way to ensure we have a pleasant lounge experience during our stay there. Already looking forward to our next staycation here.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great property
desc: We loved our stay here and would highly recommend. Rooms and service are excellent and the Executive Lounge is outstanding (and popular). Loved the location and walking across the bridge to the shopping center and so close to the MRT. HIGHLY recommend.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Marriott memories
desc: We stayed at the JW for two nights, after our cruise. Check-in was simple and our room - which had Executive Lounge access - was large and very well appointed. As a bonus, we had a spectacular view from the window, looking at the Marina Bay Sands and the giant ferris wheel (lit up at night). The exec lounge was where we spend our time, when not strolling around the compact Bay Area or visiting the many underground shopping malls, where many a bargain was to be had. The relaxing atmosphere and plentiful snacks and drinks were complemented by the brilliant Hazel and her team, including Gab, Kay, Ren and Quiyi. Thanks for making our stay an unforgettable one, guys!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome Staycation
desc: Booked a room to celebrate a friend’s Dec birthday. Took a rest in the executive lounge while room was still under preparation. We were warmly received by Hazel , Ren, Gab and team who greeted us like an old friend and served with warm beverages and light snacks while waiting. Generous selection of food and beverages available in the lounge Received a complimentary room upgrade and late checkout, with a birthday cake and small treats! We pleasantly surprised! Thanks again Hazel- you are a credit to the team and made our stay so much better!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Absolutely wonderful!
desc: Spent 4 nights on the front and back end of my trip to Asia and I simply could have not chosen any better. Spacious and luxurious rooms, extremely nice and helpful staff. Strongly recommended. A big round of applause to the Executive lounge staff- Hazel, Ren, Gab, Elyssa, Qiyi, Fatima, John, Kay, Yeean- you guys made our stay exceptional. Your kindness and availability is superlative. Thank you for making us feel at home! We’ll be back :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay and amazing service
desc: Stayed for 2D1N and had a genuinely good time. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable and had a great view of the city. Staff at the lounge were very nice at breakfast and tea time. Hazel specifically was extremely friendly and helpful in making us feel welcomed! She had such a positive energy that made our time great :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A short but enjoyable stay
desc: After a holiday in the Maldives followed by a two week cruise we finished our trip with two nights at The J.W.Marriott. The hotel is ideally situated to explore the sights of Singapore. We had a comfortable, spacious room on the 16th floor with panoramic views. The staff are very friendly and welcoming especially in the executive lounge where Hazel and the team made us feel very special. There is also a superb infinity pool on the 18 th floor. A good choice of hotel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent facility and IT support
desc: Many thanks to Mr Munish, who helped us when we needed the HDMI cable for our PS4 and helped with the connection to the hotel wifi, me and my sons love the bonding time with our Ps4 world cup soccer. Very friendly.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the friendliest hotels in Singapore!
desc: Everyone were so welcoming the moment I stepped onto the hotel. Enjoyed my stay there as this is my first time in Singapore. Went to the gym & have a friendly chat with one of the staffs name Hafiz. He recommended me some of the hotspots & foods. Overall a great experienced throughout my stay here.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive Lounge —— a BIG PLUS
desc: We have stayed a few times in the JW Marriott Singapore and it is always a pleasure!
