As a titanium member we appreciate the lounge and the very welcoming and great service , Thank you ❤️Gab,Kay, Yeean,Quiyi, Fatima,Ren,Elissa but most Mrs HAZEL, what an outstanding and charming Lady, We look forward to our next stay😍 Also the beds are very comfortable! Ursula Schertenleib

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic Hotel with Perfect Location and Excellent Service
desc: We booked the suite for a weekend staycation and absolutely loved it. The suite came with two bathrooms, an office and a large bedroom. The panoramic view of the Singapore city skyline was simply breathtaking. We visited the Executive Lounge a couple of times during our stay and thoroughly enjoyed each of our experience there. The delicious food provided a wide array for any craving. Last but not least, the professional and friendly staff at the Executive Lounge always made us feel welcomed and comfortable. We would like to thank Hazel, John, Kay, Ren, Fatima and Alyssa for your excellent service and hospitality!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Home away from home
desc: We returned to JW Marriott again for a 2 nights staycation and we didn't realised how much we had missed it until we arrived. The staff are friendly and room is clean and great. Speical mention to the staff (Hazel, Gab, Kay, Cora, Ren, John) at the executive lounge all were very friendly and helpful. Thanks for the hospitality and we will be back again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Overbooked? Housekeeping issue
desc: Check in time as stated was at 3pm. Arrived 30min to 3 on the 19th and was advised room is not ready. Not a problem as we arrived earlier but room is not ready till 430pm Front desk was supposed to call when room is available but I was sitting right in front of the check in and no one called till I had to approached the check in to be advised the room was actually ready. Quilt had blood stains on it as well, not really well cleaned considering the delay in checking in

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott Singapore South Beach - Major pluses
desc: We stayed at the JW Marriott South Beach for a recent 3 night stay and we enjoyed it immensely. The initial impression is of a typical business hotel. The lobby area and reception are so so - kind of long and narrow with not that many seating areas if you have a larger group or waiting for a room to be ready. We were upgraded to a Premium King room and I would say the room also is nothing special. In fact I would say the rooms are pretty small for an upscale 5 star hotel. The bathroom is spacious with separate toilet (heated seat, which I don't care for really) and separate shower. The amenities are top notch. They give you a hot kettle in the room to heat up water if you want coffee - instant NesCafe coffee - which is less than desirable I'd say. Also, the lights were

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Avoid this property of Marriott
desc: We stayed at this property during our transit halt. We had booked 2 suites. When we reached there they didn’t had suites close enough and we didn’t want my kids and my 82 Year old mom to stay away from us. So we settled for smaller rooms next to each other. Once we reached back to San Francisco the hotel emailed us that shower bottles were missing and charged us $200.00 In fact there were no shower bottles but three Velcro stripes. We took shower with a soap bar. I have been a Marriott member from past 5 years and never heard a thing like that. I replied to their email but no reply. Do not get scammed and avoid this property

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Appreciation for Mr. Munish!
desc: Dear Team! It has been an absolute delight staying at Marriot in November and December 2022. In November, during our stay we were struck in the room as the room safety key had issue. The front desk immediately put Mr. Munish in action who released the key,did an excellent job in getting the job done with lot of patience. He was extremely thoughtful to place a beautiful toy and a keychain as a token of completion. Thank you so much for employing wonderful people like Mr. Munish who do their job with immense dedication and always carry a smile. Thank you so much Mr. Munish for your prompt help!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic hotel in Marina Bay with amazing staff.
desc: Fantastic hotel, would 100% recommend if you're after a hotel in the Marina Bay area. - Clean and modern rooms with amazing views (with a Marina bay room) - Extremely friendly and accommodating staff to requests. Requseted a high floor and late checkout, and were given both even during a busy period - Swimming pool on the 14th floor with pool table and table tennis table. Staff were very friendly and attentive, proactively roaming around to guests - Hotel staff go the extra mile for the little things which didn't go unnoticed e.g. - pressing / holding elevator doors for guests - running around taxis to open doors for guests - checking in and asking how guests are - Turndown service was a nice touch in the evening - Housekeeping staff providing extra towels when

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Singapore first time
desc: JW Marriott Singapore South Beach did not disappoint with its central location, clean and nice sized room that we were upgraded as a Platinum member to a room with the bay view; also, the breakfast and tea time team at executive lounge were very friendly and helpful- especially a shout out to Hazel, Ren, Gab, John, Elyssa and Qiyi :) Thanks for all you do for the guests!! We only had one day where the room was not made and towels not renewed, which upon a quick request from the front desk is taken care of right away. So overall a nice first stay.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding of The Year!
desc: There is no doubt if you’d like to have “The Wedding of The Year”, JW Marriot South Beach is the place to have it. The infrastructure of The Grand Ballroom itself will wow your wedding guests. The interior LED display and the crystal-like lightings hanging from the ceiling created and immersive and magical experience for us all. As the bride and wedding planner, it was challenging of a task but the service JW Marriot’s personnel has provided us was truly commendable. Dickson’s team, alongisde Thana and Fauzi, were really professional throughtout the ceremony and have been very quick and prompt in assisting us in all our planning and execution. Not forgetting the banquet team, they were attentive in assisting all our guests’ needs and even noticed to the littlest of detail to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Three night stopover in South Beach
desc: Great stay at this hotel at South Beach. Close enough to to walk to the Marina and along Beach Road to Raffles and Kampong Glam. In a modern development with several restaurants. Bridge access to Suntec shopping and onwards so if it’s raining or too hot you don’t have to go outside. Our one criticism was the swimming pool. Not heated, totally out of the sun and no sun loungers so not somewhere to say if you want a couple of days by the pool. Spacious bedroom with amazing views. Lots of storage, however the area around the sink for toiletries was too small, a good sized powerful shower, bath and an electronic loo! The hotel restaurant is the South Beach Kitchen and we ate there on our first night. We were late arriving and didn’t want the full buffet on order so the staff

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful experience at the spa!
desc: Cherie introduced me to the spa and made me feel welcome and comfortable. Jaslyn was my massage therapist and she was amazing! I got a deep tissue massage and left feeling so relaxed. Best massage I have ever had hands down! 10/10 would recommend!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Another great stay
desc: Hotel lobby was decorated according to the festive season and had a nice scent when we arrived. We were assisted by Lorraine at the Reception, and she made the process fuss free and efficient. Room was spacious with comfortable bed and big bathtub. One of the best hotel breakfast we had at Beach Road Kitchen. The spread was huge with plenty of options. Food were tasty and all staff members were polite and eagar to assist. Will definitely recommend

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Business Lounge experience
desc: I was at this property for business four times in 2022, and I started 2023 with a family trip back here ahead of a week's holiday in Indonesia. They can make you feel at home, whether you come for business or leisure. In this review, I want to focus on the excellent services provided in the executive lounge. I was here in February 2022 when there were still restrictions in place, and later when everything was back to normality: the feeling of being at home was always the same; the manager, Cora, can superbly run this lounge, helped by all her staff, where Hazel shines for her ability to anticipate any needs. Breakfast, afternoon tea, and happy hours are always served with a large variety of choices, and everyone is running to be sure guests' glass does not run out of what

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing experience with the family
desc: Cannot recommend this hotel enough. The staff have been exceptionally accommodating and the service here is great especially because we qre traveling with family. They have taken great cares to make sure we are comfortable and set up with a crib and baby amenities. The lounge spreads for breakfast were family favorites and the selection is one of the best we've seen across marriott properties around the world. We will definitely be staying here again when we come back to Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great place to stay
desc: The service of the staff in this hotel is the best compare to other hotels we had stayed. This had been our 3rd tines staying here with my husband. We enjoy the club lounge, where the staff are friendly, they treat us very nicely. Specially Ms. Hazel, who has been super nice, and she remember us everytime we come back to this hotel. Location of this hotel is so nice that we can walk to explore singapore by walking to many food places.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: What a fabulous lodging experience!!
desc: I have travelled to many hotels around the world and the one I had at the JW Marriott was the best I've ever had!! Hazel in the concierge lounge made my experience so much better through her kindness and her desire to go above and beyond to make my time there so wonderful. I really enjoyed my room and the great view of the city. I really felt like my stay enhanced my impressions of Singapore!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Beautiful hotel and best service ever!
desc: Incredible hotel and facilities! Eve gym pool bar level at the top is the best view of the city. As a Titanium member, we’ve been to many lounges and this one by far was the BEST we’ve been to. The tea time and dinner hour w noodle bar was delicious. Hazel Cora Kay the lounge leader on the floor was extraordinary!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A Place To Stay in Singapore
desc: A very pleasant stay at JW Marriott Singapore. I am Titanium Elite member but unable to get a suite upgade due to unavailable. However, I was ugraded to larger room with a view of the city. Thank you so much to the Executive Lounge Team for taking care of us specially when my wife wasn't feeling well. Thank you Executive Team. So many names to mention but to mention a few like Hazel, Cora,Gab, Ren, Kay, Randy, Qiyi, and Jerome, a million thanks to all of you! A very nice place to be. Will definitely stay again in the future! A & B Torres

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent Hospitality Top Food Friendly People
desc: First time at a JW Marriott must say this is one of the best hotels I have ever been to worldwide Including New York Italy and Japan. Front desk staff and food outlets provide excellent hospitality highly recommend for business and leisure. This hotel is different because they make your stay comfortable memorable and easy specially for long stay. A few issues occurred during the stay but hotel staff front desk and food outlets recognized issue provided solutions and never occurred again. Breakfast consisted of a full buffet includes variety of international food items good omelet station. Lounge offered changing dinner menus and drinks during happy hour clean good service folks remember your face name and provide help looking up tours and things to do in Singapore. Location

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: AMAZING!
desc: Excellent service. Friendly staff that are authentically interested in the guest’s well-being. Gracious variety of restaurants. Inviting spa with talented massage therapists. My 5 days here made me feel at home and I would 100% recommend the JW Marriott!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Staycation
desc: JW Marriott South Beach is my favourite staycation hotel in Singapore. This would be my 3rd visit in the property and they have maintained the consistency of the level of service. Kudos to the club team Cora and Gabriel for the great hospitality. They are very attentive to our needs and always make us feel at home. Special mention to the runner or maybe room attendant that delivered our room amenities in room 1113 on 23rd January. I feel bad I did not catch his name but he was so polite and friendly. I really have to compliment the best breakfast buffet in Singapore. I have tried other 5star hotels like Sofitel Sentosa, Fullerton and Intercontinental (sorry to compare). But nothing beats Beach Road Kitchen restaurant. Can’t wait for my next visit!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One reason to love SG 🥰
desc: Their suites are superb! It has a receiving area with a closet for our shoes and a common restroom. Our living room is very spacious, i just wish it's more well lit during the evening though, I had difficulty working in the evening. We can see skyscrapers in our bedroom and bathroom. I like that the walls are glass, you can see SG everywhere. We had our breakfast at the lounge and the food was delicious! They don't serve rice but I love their noodle soup so much and of course my mocha cafe! Also, the staffs are very accommodating and they always attend to our needs. Special thanks to Hazel, Joy, Kay, Ren, Mekaela and Gab, keep up the good service and happy smiles guys! I really hope to see you again next time! Thanks! ;) Their pool is at the 18th floor and the view their is

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional visit
desc: I stayed for work for a few weeks. The staff were outstanding. Including the executive lounge. Very tentative and welcoming. It was a home away from home. Rooms were kept tidy. Hotel was clean and up to date. Sadly the room had no outlet in the bathroom or international converter. But that was a minor issue made up by the full size tub and walk in shower.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: My first spa experience with Spa by JW was impeccable
desc: I got a gift certificate to try out Spa by JW’s signature massage, and being a newbie to the wonders of a solid massage I didn’t hesitate to redeem this in 2023. Kristin was exceptionally helpful and patient with me as I asked questions about the process of the massage therapy and the other facilities within the spa. I couldn’t have asked for a better therapist than Hatmah, who made me feel so comfortable I fell asleep on the bed halfway through the massage (the imprint of the massage bed head on my face can attest to this). She constantly checked in to see if I was comfortable with the pressure, and if I was comfortable with the heat of the stones used on my back to ease tension. Rest assured, this will be the first of many massages at Spa by JW to come this year.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Perfection
desc: Perfect!! What an amazing experience in this beautiful hotel. A must is sitting in the roof top pool watching the sunset from inside the pool with a drink. The executive lounge for afternoon cocktails and breakfast was amazing. Impeccable service and outstanding food choices. A big shout out to the staff Hazel💖, Ren, Kay, Cora, Gab, Joy and the chefs. I felt I was eating at a Michelin starred restaurant and every need was anticipated and met. Love it and please don’t miss this unique opportunity for a perfect vacation.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Modern luxury
desc: I thoroughly enjoy my stay here while in Singapore. The hotel is very luxurious with a great modern design. The staff are outstanding, each person being very friendly and attentive. For example, frequently while waiting at the elevators housekeeping would stop as they were walking by to wish us well for our day. We were upgraded to a club room on the top floor. It had a spectacular view of Marina Bay Sands and the surrounding area. I tried to request suite night awards but the stay wasn’t eligible. The breakfast buffet in the main restaurant was the largest selection I’ve ever experienced including many dishes from numerous cuisines. We also went to the lounge for hors d’oeurves one evening. Hors d’oeurves was a huge understatement with multiple meat,

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: I felt special in a large hotel
desc: From before our arrival this Hotel treated us very special. We are Platinum, so have a small bit of elite status. We arrived at the hotel before 7 AM. Obviously, our room was not ready, yet front desk staff organized it with the executive lounge for us to have breakfast. Our room was ready by 1 PM. Moreover, the Executive Lounge staff always seem to go to great lengths to make us feel welcome and taken care of over the 6 days of our stay. We were not treated any differently than any other guest, they looked after everyone. Hazel always came by to say hello, and make sure we had the drink we wanted, etc. Cora, Gab, Ren, Elisa, and Kay became friendly faces we count on seeing on our many visits to the lounge. House keeping took care to anticipate our needs. They gave us extra

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Guest Experience & Stay
desc: Had an amazing stay & memorable stay! Would like to give a huge shoutout to the whole JW team for the impeccable attention to detail throughout every guest experience touchpoint from arrival to departure - hotel room, facilities, F&B to the executive lounge... Thank you especially to Hazel, Ren, Gab, Kay, Cora & Elyssa from the executive lounge and also Linda from housekeeping. Highly recommend. ✨

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: The JW Marriott is a great and comfortable stay, the staff are really friendly and helpful, especially Hazel, Gab, Ren, Elissa & Kay in the Executive Lounge, can’t thank them enough for their incredible hospitality! In particular Hazel has gone above and beyond for me and my family every time me visit. Thank you so much team! Can’t wait to see you again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional Hotel
desc: My wife and I have stayed at the JW Marriott in Singapore on many occasions. Each visit we are treated with the highest degree of customer service. The overall facility is spotless and the rooms are very functional with quality technology such as electric blinds, self cleaning cavities and roominess. It resides in a very good location to move around the city and there are various restaurants and bars that are very nice. We highly recommend this hotel and it one of the finest in the world. I am an Ambassador in the Marriott Bonvoy hotel project so I speak from experience in my review.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Perfect Stay - Thank you to the Loyalty Team
desc: The property is a perfect location for walking to Gardens by the Bay and Marina Bay area. The hotel is very clean. The hotel staff are friendly - especially in the lounge. The food selection in the lounge is plentiful with a high quality selection. We stayed at the property to celebrate our 1-year wedding anniversary which is also on New Years Eve. As you can imagine, the property was fairly busy. The lounge was a little busier than usual. Despite this, the staff still made you feel welcome while trying to manage overflow in the lounge area. I would like to thank Sabrina from guest relations for a very thoughtful welcome gift for our wedding anniversary upon our arrival. The loyalty team here at the JW Marriott South beach is truly excellent (above and beyond). Really made our

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott South Beach Singapore
desc: Throughly enjoyed our week long stay for our 47th wedding anniversary. Treated like Royalty from 5:30am check in handled with so much care at Reception by Lorraine. We used the Executive Lounge extensively and can’t speak more highly by the excellent Customer Service and support in particular by Hazel. There were also others like Gab, Elissa, Cora, Ren and Kay who made us feel at home each and everyday. Not forgetting the Marriott Bonvoy staff who took care each day to ensure all our needs were taken care of. Thank you, Thank you. Can’t wait to return!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Big comfy bed, great views, deep tub, and a japanese toilet!
desc: We were here on a 2-night layover from Sydney to New York. Our room was large and the bed was comfy. It had a large bathroom with a huge shower and separate deep soaking tub. Also love that they had a Toto Washlet bidet toilet in the room! Very convenient given how, uh, “brave” we were being with all of the amazing food choices Singapore has to offer. I also apprecaited that you could turn the AC down to 18C and it would actually comply (hotels in Asia often bottom out at 21 or 22). The hotel is in a huge complex that’s quite difficult to navigate. There are busy roads with no pedestrian crossings surrounding it, so defintely ask the concierge for walking directions to whatever you’re trying to visit. If you can find your way out, there’s actually a cute bar and restuarant

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful Hotel and Quality Staff
desc: Just a quick note to express our sincere appreciation that your hotel staff extended to our family from January 2-9, 2023. During our stay, we were greeted numerous times by wonderful professionals. Additionally, our appreciation to your Executive Lounge professional (Hazel) for her daily welcome and commitment to any of our needs and concerns. As a Lifetime Titanium Elite member, I will always think highly of our stay at the JW Marriott, Singapore. Again, thanks and looking forward to our next visit to Singapore

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Always an amazing stay
desc: The J W Marriott is such a stylish and friendly hotel. All the staff make you feel so welcome. Im a lucky lady who sometimes get to accompany her husband on business trips. While my husband is working I spend my time around one of the two pools or wandering around the Bay Area. Our room is modern, spacious with a large bathroom area. All very clean. The hotel is in a great location and I have walked to many of the tourist attractions from the hotel. The club room has great food with breakfast, afternoon tea and evening snacks, cocktails for quite a few hours in the evenings. The staff in the club room are so friendly and really look after you. We would like to thank Elissa,Qiyi,Gab, Cora, Ren and Kay. We have an extra special thank you to Hazel who has looked after us

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A great place to start the new year
desc: A wonderful hotel to end the first week in the new year right. The front desk staff, Haris, Sabrina & Teck Li were professional and helpful each time I approached tftknt desk. The concierge team, especially Farhan, was very friendly and professional. The staff in the executive lounge were simply wonderful and very attentive. The team comprising Cora, Hazel, Gab, Elyssa, Sasa, Qiyi, Kay, Ren, John, Yee An took great care of us whenever we visited the lounge. The food served in the executive lounge were simply delicious. It’s because of the service provided by the staff that really made us visit the hotel again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Thank you!
desc: Overall, a great experienced throughout our stay here. Everyone was so welcoming the moment we stepped into the hotel especially the front desk with our early morning arrival. When the room wasn't ready, we were sent to the lounge. Incredible breakfast, service and personal assistance from Hazel. We had a chance to meet with Cora who was such a wonderful person who took care of us during cocktail hours along with Hazel. This is our first time in Singapore and we enjoyed it very much. A shout out for Muhammad who also took care of our transportation services, good man! Thanks much!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Just better than ok
desc: My 2nd time here and probably last. Front desk service perfunctory with no acknowledgement of my ambassador status. Didn’t want to upgrade me to next level suite saying it’s “excluded” My suite was ok on lowish floor. Tiny walk in closet - luggage couldn’t even lie flat and i bang my shoulders several times a day. Also nowhere to hang 2nd towel in the bathroom Gym smallish but ok Pool smallish and part indoors so you don’t get all the sun The breakfast restaurant is a nice surprise with outstanding variety The other 2 restaurants are not bonvoy so no discount Location next to suntec and marina square malls but nothing to buy or eat from there

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hotel for seeing Singapore that has amazing service
desc: We wanted to get a glimpse of Singapore and stayed at the JW Marriott for 2 days. The JW is a clean, spacious and modern hotel. The location of the hotel is right in South Beach and within walking distance to the Gardens by the Bay. There is a great 5K loop where you can run by the Merlion, Marina Bay Sands, and Garden by the Bay. A metro station is right underneath the hotel. The hotel is right across the street from the Suntec Mall. The service at the hotel was awesome. The front desk was accommodating with our early morning arrival. When the room wasn't ready, they sent us to the executive club lounge. This was the best club lounge we have ever eaten at. The quality and variety of food was incredible for breakfast and dinner. They also had made to order

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful staycay to celebrate birthday
desc: Booked a room for my girl's birthday. Experience was wonderful since stepped into the hotel. Smooth check in, hotel arranged some sweet treats to the birthday girl.. The swimming pool's view really superb. Went to Flow18 twice. Of course, kids hungry after swim and room service was the easier way for us. So delicious and my children loves it. Special thanks to Joan from room service. Food served warm, when she entered the room, she helped us to take out the food from warmer and reminded us (especially my kids) that the plates are hot. Thank you Joan for your service. Mac n cheese for the kids and they loved it. And I ordered the laksa. Laksa gravy was so nice, a little different is that, laksa comes with soft shell crab instead. Something unique I would say. Also managed

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best decision ever to hold our wedding at this hotel!
desc: From the bottom of our hearts, my husband and I would like to thank the hotel and staff for making our wedding such a HUGE success! First of all, the banquet hall is absolutely stunning (we were blown away and decided on the spot to choose this hotel as our wedding venue - BEST DECISION EVER) and it is functional as well (lifts cater to every floor of the venue + there are separate bridal (directly connected to a big bathroom FYI!) & entourage makeup rooms located at the building itself that are privately tucked away in corners; don't have to go up to your hotel room to do any makeup etc). Second, the bridal suite was spacious and with beautiful views of the Singapore skyline! The hotel room was also very cosy and clean - even with automated & heated bidet seats! Thirdly,

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Just good branding not good quality
desc: I came here around 4pm but the room isn't ready, on my birthday they didn't give any special preparation. The location is near ti suntec city, room is not spacious. Breakfast is not fabulous and nothing delicious

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing people
desc: I rarely write reviews, but I have to call out the extraordinary care that Jolyn at the spa and Bernice at the concierge station gave to me and my wife on our recent trip to Singapore. We were able to squeeze in a spa appointment, right before they closed that made all the difference before we went to the airport to fly directly back to United States. Bernice made it all happen, carried our bags, and even gave us a spontaneous anniversary gift. Whenever I’m in Singapore, I always stay at the Marriott, not just because of the wonderful location and facilities, but most importantly, because of the extraordinary people

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Outstanding hotel with absolutely exceptional Executive Lounge staff!
desc: If you are lucky enough to have booked a room with Executive Lounge privileges (or have access as part of your Marriott Bonvoy status), you will not be disapppointed with the Executive Lounge. The selection of food and beverage items is extensive (and include many “healthy” options). Most notably, the Executive Lounge staff (Hazel, Cora, Kay, Joy, Mekaela, Ren, and the rest of the team) work cohesively to provide a top-notch experience. They are always there to offer you something more, bring your attention to available items that might not have been obvious, clear your plate, and encourage you to “Please enjoy!” and “Eat more!” (Hazel, this is looking at you). My only complaint about the lounge, if I was really pressed to find something, is that the “Quiet Zone” is not

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Singapore ❤️
desc: The JW Marriott South Beach is a great hotel in a fantastic location. More importantly, the service and staff were impeccable. Thank you Sabrina at the front desk for acknowledging my elite status and upgrading me to an amazing suite. Additionally, I want to thank the entire staff in the Elite Lounge for making my stay memorable. A special acknowledgement to Jeini for your genuine kindness and outstanding professionalism. I look forward to staying at your property in the near future. Thank you. 🙏🏾

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Booked hotel for wedding banquet and 2 night stay!
desc: Stayed in the bridal suite and it was a pleasant experience. We booked our wedding banquet with JW Marriott South Beach and they've the most beautiful ballroom, along with the best staff for support. Big thank you to: Banquet I/C: Neilson Banquet 2nd I/C: Maran AV I/C: Fauzi Chinese Head Chef: Raymond Sales: Laura Pleasant dinner and 10/10 would recommend.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Stay at JW Marriott Hotel South Beach Singapore
desc: I had my wedding at JW Marriott in February 2023. It was a great experience as the ballroom was very beautiful and the most feedback from my guests was that the banquet food was very good. The bridal suite that was given to us was very comfortable and clean. The staff at JW Marriott was very friendly and professional. From the bellboy to room service staff to counter staff, and even the chefs during breakfast were very friendly. It made my stay there very enjoyable. Highly recommend!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Scary
desc: Scary room - the 2 wallpaper art work are scary - tv just screen just goes dark itself sometimes while still powered on, you need to power it off and power it on again.. screen will just go dark after awhile - make up mirror light keeps flickering sometimes though it says auto-off - toilet with sensor cleans itself when it detect you coming in, but then it just cleans itself in the middle of the night - the changing colour lighting effects in the elevator is just too much

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful place to spend time in Singapore
desc: Great location for visiting all the sites in Singapore. Very easy access to MRT, which easily gets you to shopping, Botanic Gardens, National Orchid Garden, Gardens by the Bay, and Marina Bay Sands. The Executive Lounge provides a great place to get a bite or a drink. Hazel and her associates are the best! They made us feel at home, even though we were 13 times zones away. They greeted us with a smile and great service every morning before we headed out for our day.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: My home away from home in Singapore
desc: The JW Marriott SG is one of the few hotels that I look forward to returning to when I travel. The AMAZING service from all staff from housekeeping to bell hop to front desk to exec lounge to check in is second to none. In such a busy, frenetic city, the hotel promotes a sense of calm and a sense of home while surrounded by the buzz of Singapore. The hotel staff make everything easy and so accommodating from check in / check out to arranging car services to suggesting restaurants to in room dining. Everything just ebbs and flows which is wonderful feeling as a guest. And i can not say enough about the Executive Lounge service and staff. First the food is to die for. I am guaranteed to gain at least five pounds while there due to the breakfast alone. Second, despite the

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good weekend stay
desc: A wonderful hotel to end a hectic week. The staff in the executive lounge were very attentive and were able to anticipate our every need. The team comprising Cora, Hazel, Gab, Fifi, Kay, Renz, Sasa took great care of us when we visited the lounge. The food served in the executive lounge were a delight. It’s because of the service provided by the staff that really made us visit the hotel again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One night stay
desc: Stayed for one night on they way back from “down under”. Couldn’t fault anything. Emailed in advance to say that we would be late arrival as our flight wasn’t arriving until 22.30. They replied reassuring the room would be held. Quick check in. Room very large and really lovely. We booked a room which included the executive lounge so we has a very good breakfast there and then went back in the afternoon for tea. A big thank you to Hazel in the executive lounge who was so kind and helpful. Highly recommend this hotel. It’s in a very central location too.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic experience!!!
desc: I accompanied my husband on a work trip, his 5th and my 1st. I was so impressed with the staff, specifically Gabriel (front desk exec), Hazel was an extraordinary hostess at the Executive Lounge, along with Gab, Kay, Elyssa, Ren and Fifi! I can't recommend the JW Marriott South Beach enough, you'll not be sorry staying with them!!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Such a lovely experience
desc: This is a hotel situated right in the city, so you’re connected to everything you need - and it also provides a tranquil space to rejuvenate and / work. I had such a lovely stay there and the executive lounge was definitely one of the highlights. The staff are extremely attentive and make you feel at ease. The staff there - Cora, Gab, Elyssa, Kay - are so friendly and professional! Special shout out to Hazel for providing such a warm environment! Will definitely be back!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Superb hotel experience - here for business but my kids would have loved it 🤩
desc: Stylish and comfortable rooms with excellent modern bathroom. Very well fitted out gym including rack and free weights. Beautiful infinity pool with view over the city and games area with billiard table, table football and table tennis. Delicious buffet breakfast and attentive and friendly service from Michael Ong, manning the front desk. Overall fantastic experience! 2 tips: 1) the concierge recommended Shenton medical center wouldn’t guarantee the express PCR test so sent me to the hospital. Raffles was easy to get to and quick for the test. 2) fresh milk in the Beautiful Nespresso machine would make so much nicer Latte’s/Cappucinos than the UHT milk in there. Fortunately Michael fixed this on request

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Customer Service Sincere and Helpful
desc: Personal Service with a smile is my take away from my stay especially at the Executive Lounge! My wife and I were here on a business trip and Hazel at the Executive Lounge helped us immensely and was always very attentive. Gabriel was also helpful in seeing my business associates found me and were able to see me. All in all the lounge experience was fantastic mainly due to the people!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Top notch service and stay!
desc: Stayed at the JW Marriott South Beach for just one night, but I thoroughly enjoyed my stay there! We were warmly welcomed by Sarah and Gabriel at the front desk. Check-in was done seamlessly and we got into our connecting rooms on the high floor quickly! Loved how the rooms were designed so spaciously, especially the bathrooms! The team was thoughtful enough to ensure that there were enough water and towels so that we would not have to request for more! We absolutely loved the recreational area on level 18! The infinity pool overlooking the Marina and Singapore river, along with the billiards table, a funky ping pong table and Foosball table! There were plenty of areas to play and chill. We ended off our stay with the breakfast at Beach Road Kitchen, and the variety and

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best Concierge Lounge JW Marriott Singapore
desc: Simply amazing with a few hiccups. We booked a Marina Bay view suite and weren’t disappointed. Check in was shaky 20 minute wait and then over two hours and multiple phone calls to get our luggage. The room views are a delight and at night it’s amazing. Views ofMarina Bay Sands Marina Bay and the Singapore Skyline are nothing short of spectacular. Our room at 100m was very spacious separate living and bedroom and two bathrooms. The main bathroom includes two sinks a large shower and soaking tub. The concierge lounge is the Shinning Star. Located on level two we were graciously greeted and quickly seated. Lots of seating options including separate little rooms and a quiet area. Starting at 530 pm the cocktails are complimentary as well as soda tea coffee etc. Food options were

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Avoid!
desc: If you want to be woken up in the middle of the night by the super loud bad music from the dance club next door this hotel is the place to go. The management and staffs all know about it but will never tell guests at check-in. Regret big time choosing this hotel and will never come back.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best place to stay in Singapore if you are a frequent Marriott traveler
desc: I switched to the JW Marriott in Singapore in April from two other Marriott hotels I had stayed at for the 5 prior years. The team and the hotel are the best. Hazel, Gabriel, Renz, Cora and QiYi in the lounge are absolutely the best. Zita, responsible for frequent guest relations is lovely and Fifi, Kay, Elyssa and others in the lounge are also great. As is Saatiis from the bell desk. I have said for years that the JW Marriott Hong Kong is the best hotel for high level Bonvoy members in Asia, but the last year has convinced me that the JW Marriott South Beach in Singapore (followed closely by the St Regis Singapore) is the best Marriott hotel in Asia. Mostly because of the great team who I have mentioned above. Stay here.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hotel
desc: Friendly and professional front desk, large, nicely furnished bedrooms, and great bathrooms. The gym is clean and well equipped with both free weights and machines. Breakfast is extensive and tasty, and the bar on the ground floor serves some excellent gin cocktails. Highly recommended.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great experience!
desc: I never write reviews, but my experience at JW was worth sharing. If you have any hesitation on booking, don’t be. Book the hotel! The service is exceptional, and it really speaks to why some properties are able to build loyalty. They made our small side trip to Singapore memorable, and now we will be coming back next year to bring the whole family. Special shoutout to Hazel (Executive Lounge), Rose (Swimming pool), and the young man (bell boy) who always booked our taxi. They were all so kind and made our stay even better. Thank you, Erica Titanium Elite Member

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Brilliant execution and a great location
desc: This hotel is easily the best of the Marriott properties in Singapore. It is in a very easy to find location with great proximity to the MRT. The executive lounge is one of the best I’ve encountered as a Platinum Elite, special mention to Hazel, Ren, Gab, Fifi, Qiyi and Kay for their overwhelming hospitality and kindness and grace in their jobs. Thank you to everyone and I will be back! James (Platinum Elite)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay with the BEST club lounge
desc: Where to begin… our stay was absolutely amazing. From the beautiful rooms, the generous offering, wonderful housekeeping service (everything was replaced daily and never a missing item) to the best club lounge I’ve ever experienced (and I’ve been to a lot!). The club lounge was the standout though I must say. The whole team that served us during our stay were friendly, fun, efficient and nothing was too much to ask. They topped up drinks generously and made the effort to always say hi and chat. It was so genuinely warm and just lovely. Hazel was the absolute star of the show and working in hospitality businesses myself, she is an incredible asset to your hotel. 10/10! I cannot wait to return to your beautiful hotel in the near future and will definitely recommend to all. 💕

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Traumatic experience and did not live to the JW standard
desc: The experience didn’t live up to the JW Marriott brand. I was very disappointed and will not return. 1. The check in line was about 20 people line. Very inefficient process (about 5-7 minutes per customer check in. I counted). 2. I got a room in the east building which must be the worst layout. It had no view (looking out into wooden panels which then look into a restaurant arcade. It was loud and dark. At night 10pm can still hear speaker music from the restaurants) 3. The room was tiny. My room had no bath tub. The room lacks the basic amenities, for example coffee machine. For a hotel that’s charging 600+ per night, it should not serve Nestle instant coffee packets. 4. The AC thermostat wasn’t working. It was too cold and did not respond to control. 5. The worst part:

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott Singapore is the BEST. 😍
desc: This is our 2nd visit to the JW Marriott Singapore this month, before and after our cruise. The hotel is beautiful. The location is perfect. The staff is amazing…starting with the bellman handing our bags to the front desk taking care of all the details. Hazel Ren Kay & Elyssa were the perfect hosts in the Executive Lounge. We were always greeted with warm friendly smiles. They made us feel like special guests. We hope to be back soon.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Location and Even Better Service
desc: My wife and I stayed at the JW Marriott Singapore for 3 days in February and consider it one of the best hotels we've ever visited. The hotel is located in South Beach, within walking distance of many top sites: Merlion fountain, Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Hawker food locations and Raffles (home of the Long Bar and Singapore Sling). The rooms were modern and comfortable, with fully equipped bathrooms and views (from the 15th floor) over the city. The lobby is decorated with modern art, including a spectacular entry. We especially enjoyed the elevators, decorated with scenes of sea life and lit with fixtures that change color, bringing out different creatures based on the light color. The hotel is adjacent to the Esplanade MRT station for quick access to other

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good service
desc: The service at the executive lounge is excellent. Staff are very helpful and friendly. The team is professional and nice. Food for the evening hour is amazing too. Would recommend coming to the lounge.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: What is the Best In JW South Beach
desc: Hi, My name is Chrissian, I been staying this hotel since last years spent my birthday and it was a memorable one. I travelled a lot stay some nice and stunning hotel. But there's is something in JW Marriott that you will keep coming back and this is what I will share to everyone.I only do a honest review. JW Marriott is very convenient to all the heritage places in Singapore, apart from that They welcome you like a Family ( A home away from your home).They welcome you with smile and respect,above all to feel how you feel your 'Home'. What I like about this hotel,they are very clear about their amenities,bars,restaurant,gym, etc. I loved the executive lounge, the staff are very accomodating, From Ms Cora, Ms. Hazel,Gab and the rest of the team. You will feel their genuine

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent stay
desc: Very comfortable hotel in a fantastic location for exploring this amazing city. We had an incredible view from our room over the war memorial park towards the city skyline. Ate breakfast here on one day and the choice was huge! Staff were very professional and friendly. Highly recommend.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful 4 Days in Singapore
desc: We had a great stay at the JW Marriott in late March 2023. The staff were outstanding and took very good care of us responding to every request we made. A particular shout out goes to the Conceirge staff and to Hazel Kay in the executive lounge who went above and beyond to support our stay and enrich our Singapore experience. I’ve stayed in many Marriott properties around the world and the executive lounge at the JW Marriott Singapore is by far the best lounge in terms of food options, accessibility over the entire day and staff support while in the lounge. In short it’s the best Hotel lounge service I’ve ever experienced. Special Thanks to Hazel 👍

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing JW Singapore South Beach
desc: Just finished up another trip to the excellent JW Marriott Singapore South Beach! As always, I received outstanding service and accommodations from the team here. From check in to check out everyone is friendly and helpful. The great executive lounge is made awesome with Hazel’s service who treats everyone in there like they are the only people she’s taking care of and paying attention to every detail. Her service is top notch and she smiles at everyone and never stops moving. Breakfast is one if the best I’ve ever seen at the restaurant just across the way from the lobby. Love this hotel and it’s absolutely my go to when in Singapore!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: The best exective lounge ever!!
desc: The exective lounge is very large and relaxing, with various different food presentations and drink menu. Lots of different seats are there - sofa, high chair, dining table & chairs. It's very nice I can choose where I want to sit depending on what I expect there. And, the hospitality from Hazel and her team was fantastic!! I really enjoyed the time and will definately come back again :) The lounge is located at 2nd floor.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott Hotel Review
desc: Very friendly staff all around, especially the excess lounge. With special thanks to Hazel, who took extra good care of us during breakfast and tea time. She showed consistent attention to my family and I during every visit to the lounge. She was very courteous and never failed to accommodate any of our requests. If you visit, do look out for her as she will make your stay a memorable one!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Elegant, luxurious, enjoyable!
desc: From start to finish this hotel screams elegance and luxury. Check in process was so smooth, personal and friendly. The room was huge, clean, very modern, stocked with lots of ammenities. The inclusive breakfast downstairs at the cafe is one of the best I’ve had access to, highly recommend, many many options. The standout for my partner and I, would have to be the Filipina crew (Hazel, Cora, Ren, Gab and Qiyi) at their executive lounge. They absolutely made our stay so much more enjoyable and I would love if our thanks could be reiterated to them again. Their knowledge, friendliness, helpfulness and just their genuine interest in talking to us was so warming. They are a credit to your hotel. Having only 4 nights in Singapore, we made it a point to go yo every night prior to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Beautiful room and excellent lounge
desc: Excellent experience at JW Marriott. My first time staying here and was very impressed with the furnishing and views from the suite. Staff were all very attentive, special commendation to Hazel at the executive lounge, who ensured that my friend and I felt welcome, well looked after, and well fed. She is quite the star of the lounge area!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome!
desc: Terrific hotel in a perfect location. Plenty of restaurants and a MRT station practically on the property. Some city view rooms offer a perfect view of the evening light shows at Marina Bay. Exceptionally good service, especially in the executive lounge. Many thanks to Hazel, Lay, Gae, Cora and ren for making our stay so memorable.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Hotel
desc: My 2nd stay at here is much more memorable than before. Fast check in and I was given perfect room view towards Marina view. As my stay I always went to Gym & Pool I would like to give special thanks to Andrew at Recreation. I admired his professionalism and hard work in taking care of all guests that visited Flow18 & Ebb6 and I can tell he is everywhere. Will definitely stay here again in nearest time! Thank you Jw Marriott.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the best stays ever!!
desc: Amazing hotel!! I had two separate stays in March and I can’t wait to return. The staff especially Zeta’s Ambassador staff is nothing less than amazing. Clean rooms, friendly personnel and a great location. The Executive lounge is the best that I have visited in years. The food is second to none, there is no need to go anywhere else for breakfast or dinner!! The executive lounge staff especially Hazel and Afiah were the most PROFESSIONAL that I have experienced. I actually looked forward to seeing them daily. The buffet in the restaurant was well worth the $82 dollars. Seafood, Indian, sushi, smoked beef, duck and many more If you plan on visiting Singapore, don’t miss out staying somewhere else!!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great location, great lounge, great experience
desc: We loved our stay at the JW Marriott. Very convenient to public transport (a five minute walk to esplanade station) and also only a 28+ minute walk to Gardens by the bay / Marina Bay Sands district. We walked there one evening over the helix bridge and it was wonderful to see all the lights. We found the room standard to be very good and the lounge was fantastic. It was one of my favorite Marriott lounges in terms of offerings. The breakfast was very good, only complaint is that we often had to wait to get hot eggs as there always seemed to be a backup. That said we went to Tea one day and appetizers another and these was so much food available that we didn't need to really eat dinner. Hazel, in the lounge, was fantastic and looked after us very well. She always asked us

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW hotel, Beach Road Kitchen
desc: Recently visited Beach Road Kitchen at South Beach Hotel. Food is good, service is great, staff is friendly. Would like to personally give thanks to service staff Iresha who has great personality and service. Staff like her makes dinning experience great!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the best executive lounge.
desc: My first time staying at this hotel. The best executive lounge ever, food and drinks are beyond my expectation and the service is excellent. Hazel was taking care of us very well. She is amazing and so funny. And Amy is very helpful for the service. I definitely return to stay here for my next trip in Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best experience ever!!!!!
desc: Our first time staying at this JW Marriott SB. The executive lounge is amazing. They have the most thoughtful staff especially Cora, Hazel, Ren, Kay, Gabriel & Nizam. Generosity and courteous of the staff is 5 ✨. First class treatment from beginning to the end of our stay. Room was immaculate and the service is outstanding. Would recommend all my family and friends to stay at this hotel. They definitely treat you like family. Can’t wait for our next stay! JW Marriott is our home away from home! 🫶🏽

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great location with helpful staff
desc: Although I haven't stayed in every hotel in Singapore, this is certainly the best one I have visited. The staff is incredibly attentive, even by Asian standards, and the rates are relatively reasonable. The standard room isn't huge, but it's big enough to be comfortable in. I also appreciate the central location, within walking distance to most major areas. Although this hotel generally isn't listed as a great hotels for families, we found it very nice for our younger children. The staff were very nice and being at an MRT station, it was easy to get everywhere. No, it's not a Sentosa resort that completely caters to families, but if you're reading this, you're probably not interested in that. If you're looking for somewhere in town, I highly recommend the JW South Beach.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Enjoyable trip to Singapore.
desc: A hotel that close to every hotspot in Singapore. Had a great time here & enjoyed my stay at this hotel as well. Pleasant hotel with so many wonderful staffs. Nice room with a good view. Gym wasn’t that bad but a staff named Hafiz made the difference by his cheerful personality. Smiled everytime when being approached. Kudos to the gym team!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic Staff and Experience
desc: We had a fantastic stay at the hotel! The amenities were amazing and the staff in the executive lounge really made it a nice experience. They were extremely friendly and always available to help with whatever we needed. Highly recommend this hotel!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Pleasant and Enjoyable at the JW Marriott Singapore
desc: Back to stay in the JW Marriott Singapore this April, a truly enjoyable and pleasant stay. Being assigned a clean and nice room on the top floors, breakfast servings at both Beach Road Kitchen and the lounge were splendid. My stay entitle access to the executive lounge and it was so good where the lounge team provide excellent service to every guests. They are so attentive and helpful , ensuring that you are well taken care of. Thanks to the team consisting of Hazel, Gab and Cora. Will be back for even more stays.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: not most famous Singapore hotel but a truly excellent one
desc: As a Titanium-level member of Marriott, I have stayed at hotels all over the world. I stayed at this hotel for 6 nights, including the May1 Labor Day holiday weekend. “South Beach” (whose namesake in Miami has a different vibe) appears to be a downtown shopping/hotel/business district. The hotel’s location is near the MRT (subway). This hotel is perhaps not as famous as some other nearby facilities, such as the Marina Bay Sands, Raffles Hotel, or Pan Pacific, but is definitely of the same caliber. The lobby is unique and exciting. The elevators are a pleasant surprise, with dark colors and a very smooth ride (i.e., I couldn’t tell if we were going up or staying still). The buttons in the elevator are numerically ordered vertically, perhaps in deference to Asian languages.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Clean and Pleasant
desc: Beautiful hotel with friendly staff and good services. The room is well equipped from necessities to coffee/tea. The hotel is conveniently located near malls and places of interest. The buffet breakfast has a wide spread of food and beverages.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic staff
desc: Great location…fantastic Executive lounge. Food pretty much served all day…great breakfast buffet and evening canapés. But it’s the service which makes it stand out. Hazel lives up to her reputation…all the team …Cora, Elissa, Hazel, Ren are excellent ambassadors for Marriott. Remembering names, food & drink preferences from Day 1.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great experience
desc: Great hotel. I would recommend to visit the executive lounge while staying at this place. The service was great. Especially Hazel and her team (Rem, Gab, Sasa, Cora and Kay) made the stay extra pleasant. The housekeeping was also great. Youxin (housekeeper) did such a great job on our floor! He was so nice and helpful. Gonna visit again :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great to be back
desc: Great to be back at JW Marriott! Everything is still good from the services to the food. Sir oak mention to Hazel at the lounge whom always so hospitable. Ps: Would be perfect if Marriott Bonvoy elite members are allowed complimentary access to the spa facilities again. Would also like to see less use of bottled water to be more environmentally friendly

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Beautiful hotel
desc: We stayed at JW Marriott for 3 nights in April. The hotel is very close to the Marina and a great location to different malls. Super convenient. The hotel décor is contemporary and our room has big picture windows with a good view of Singapore's skyline. We are Bonvoy Elite and was upgrade to their lounge access room. They fed us so much; breakfast (7-11am), afternoon tea (starts at 2pm?), long cocktail hours (5 - 9pm every night) with amazing varieties and options of food and drinks. If Singapore was not famous with their different food and restaurants through out the city you literally do not really need to leave the hotel to go eat and would never get hungry :D The lounge staffs were extremely courteous and sweet. A big thank you to the lead server? Hazel, her sweet

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Min & Kay Actual Day
desc: We had held our wedding banquet at Marriott Singapore South beach last month. We planned only within 5 months in short period(due to change hotel) with planner Dickson Lim who very prompt response, good in planning until our wedding was successful. Dickson is very professional in wedding planning service and he is always try to consider for couple side in every single things especially for budget. We really satisfied for our day with their team's effort. Special thanks to Dickson Lim, Ms Laura, Mr Nutthe (Banquet manager in Actual day) and Mr Eugene (AV) for their support and their effort for our memorable day. We strongly recommended to Marriott South Beach 's Grand ballroom which really unique to find in Singapore. Also to hotel side, all the suite rooms are perfect for

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Beautiful, new, central, easy to get around
desc: Nice hotel, great location. My room was nice, clean, as expected from a JW. Everything went smoothly. The lounge is nice, breakfast, evening snacks, drinks were very nice. Service was very good. Outside, the hotel has a large covered area encompassing several restaurants, Starbucks and an MRT station. So getting around was a snap. I’d stay again

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic weekend staycation
desc: A last minute staycation. Great hospitality shown throughout the entire stay. A special compliment to Hazel and her group of colleagues that we have met at the executive lounge. Managed to stay at a Marina Bay view room this time. Great thanks to the person (I would presume he’s the duty manager that day). Also gotten a late check out as an elite platinum Marriott member. Everything is smooth sailing and enjoyable. Hopefully next time round, can get allocated to a suite room facing the marina view side if possible. Kudos to all the staffs that we have encountered during this occasion.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hotel, great facility and staff, and totally awesome Executive Lounge facility and team.
desc: The JW Marriott South Beach exceeds all expectations in so many ways. Great modern property, significant architecture, new and full of services, and so many staff committed to pleasing all. From the moment we arrived we were met with attentive care. Everything wonderful. Front desk, concierge, door and bell staff are all first class, but the Executive Lounge Team needs special attention and praise . On check in, Ren made sure that we had a room that he would want his family to enjoy…..enormously caring and thoughtful and although he was off duty during the last days of our stay, his graciousness while there, and his leadership on his team were felt throughout our stay. His colleague, Cora awed a team that knows how to serve. She was always present and always caring.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive Lounge and Team make this hotel exceptional
desc: I went on my own for a business trip. The hotel is very nice and the staff are all amazing. My room was a little musty and had some issues with the outlets but honestly still fantastic for what I needed. The gym is good - fair selection of equipment and free weights and machines. Not a huge amount of mat space - but everyone managed well. The pools are as everyone says - not a massive amount of space to sun bath - but there is really no one there so you can always find space. I went to the one on the 6th floor and there were 2 other people there - and that was on a Saturday afternoon. And yes - I got some sun! The thing that marks this hotel out is the EXCEPTIONAL executive lounge staff - led by Hazel who was wonderful. Very friendly, happy to help and accommodated all of our

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Pleasant Stay with JW Marriott
desc: Their bed is super comfortable! Lounge has a good varieties of food and drinks; service is great. City view from the pool is spectacular! This is my second time staying with JW Marriott. I'm definitely coming back again next time - always my choice no doubt.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great personal service at the JW Marriott in Singapore.
desc: While my wife's and my experience at the JW Marriott Singapore South Beach was not without a glitch, it was an outstanding place to stay and offerred great personal service to us during our short trip to Singapore. Despite the city's main business center, numerous shopping districts, and major sights being within walking distance or no more than a brief taxi ride away, we could have spent our time entirely within the building's complex of attractive restaurants and amenities. But for us, the best thing was the Executive Lounge at the hotel. Run by an attentive staff, most particularly Hazel who always welcomed us by name, we started each day there with breakfast and finished with hors d'oeuvres and cocktails. We definitely recommend the JW Marriott if your travels take you

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good staycation experience
desc: Stayed 2 nights and overall service is generally good. Informed them in advance about my husband’s birthday, hotel prepared a cake and handwritten card for him. Only managed to check-in 4pm as room was not ready. Housekeeping came shortly to ask if needed additional items. I thought it was turn down service. I realised there was no turndown service on the second day when I went out for dinner. Usage of app to request for service for convenient. My room on level 14 was a little noisy at night. I think the noise came from level 18 as my unit was directly below the pool area. My favourite is the heated toilet cover.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Experience
desc: Amazing stay, great property, outstanding staff. This was my first time in Singapore and I couldn’t have chosen a better property. From check in with Talgat, who provided me an excellent upgraded room, to the housekeeping staff that quickly picked on that I drank a lot of water and provided additional bottles, the staff’s keen attention to detail was amazing. The staff at the lounge were always friendly and professional. Great conversation with Jamie, who had recently started and was excited to be part of team. Hazel, Ren, Sasa, Kay and Gab always greeted me as an old friend and made me feel welcomed. Enjoyed great drinks at Tonic and would definitely choose this property in my return trips to Singapore!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Club Lounge
desc: By far the best part of this hotel is the staff. Check in was easy and they let us check in early. Booked last minute so tried to do a paid upgrade at check in, but the hotel was sold out. The rooms at this property are very small and terribly designed. Nothing is the right scale for the room. We were going to switch hotels but a suite became available which was much better, but still weirdly laid out and designed with all of the wrong materials. The actual best thing about this hotel is the club lounge and the club room staff. Hazel is basically the Queen of the Lounge and she treated everyone as if they were family. Everyone knew her name and she made sure everyone was happy and well taken care of in the lounge. Truly the best! Wouter, the Assistant Club Lounge Manger is

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Happy to have stayed at the JW Marriott Hotel
desc: I rarely write reviews but decided to do one after this trip. I travel with my husband and two young kids (8 and 5). For our stay, we booked a junior suite which had a king size bed in the bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room. The room itself includes access to the executive lounge for breakfast, afternoon tea, and hors d'oeuvres. We had maid service twice a day (morning room service and evening turn down). Upon check in, Helen made us feel welcomed. We arrived at 7am, way too early for check-in, but we were able to take a shower at the locker rooms at Flow 18 and have breakfast at their lounge. The staff at the executive lounge: Hazel, Cora, Sasa, Ren, Gab, Kay, and everyone else was very welcoming and professional. They remember what we like and were very attentive to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great service by Talgat and Zita
desc: Would like to commend Zita and especially Talgat for their empathetic and extremely pleasant service. They gave a great first impression of the property, arranged our stay impeccably, and brought out stickers and colouring papers for my child, even before I checked in. They treated us with kindness and understanding, and we were extremely lucky and honoured by their service. Kudos!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hotel, service and amazing Executive Lounge
desc: We had a great experience at the JW Singapore. All of the staff was exceptionally nice and on top of the service. We arrived early morning so our room wasn’t ready but they immediately invited us into the Executive Lounge where the service was amazing. There is a fantastic rooftop bar by the pool and the breakfast at Beach Road Kitchen is fantastic. I have to give a special shout out to the Executive Lounge staff, though. They were awesome. Cora, Gab, Ren, Sasa and Kay were very attentive and friendly, but we had the most interaction with Hazel who was funny and just amazing service. Only recommendation is start to serve mimosas for breakfast like the JW Dubai :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great property and great staff. Very welcoming.
desc: Great Marriott property to stay at if you in Singapore for a night or for a month. The staff and hospitality is as expected from a JW. The staff are professional, friendly and very courteous. Very welcoming which makes you feel special. A big thank you as always to Hazel in the Executive Lounge. Always welcoming and makes you feel at home whilst away from home. Property and rooms are fresh, clean and spacious. JW South Beach is always my go to property when visiting Singapore. Great work guys. Keep it up. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Staff
desc: The vibe on the room and hotel is posh and trendy. Most importantly the staff are amazing! Very friendly ,nice and accomodating. They ensure that we got what we need. Thanks to Kay, hazel,Cora,Ren,Gab from executive lounge and Rose from pool area assisted us and made our stay was special. We'll be back for sure.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A hotel where the experience leaves you better
desc: What is not to like about the JW? Do you enjoy having attentive staff that cater to your beck and call almost immediately? From getting our bags from the taxi up to the room in record speed, to a seamless check in, down to attention of the turn down staff who came day one and noticed we sleep early and adjusted their schedule without us even asking. Jw staff are world class. Their executive lounge is welcoming. The staff here want to ensure your stay is memorable. Serving you upon entry and ready at a moment's notice they take note of what you may need and prepare for it before you need it. This is by far the most indulgent and luxurious stay which leaves my family and I wanting more. Great job to all the staff. You guys rock and we will be back.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fresh, modern hotel, walking distance to the marina
desc: My first time at this hotel. There’s an MRT stop at the hotel making it easy to get around town. Modern rooms, hotel, complex. The lounge was very nice. Great service everywhere. Pool on the top floor was nice covered on top, yet not so big. Good for families. Out the door, there’s a feeling of comfort in the atrium area with several restaurants, bars, Starbucks all part of the same covered mall area.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Anniversary staycation
desc: I recently stayed at a hotel that exceeded all of my expectations, and it wasn't just because of the comfortable rooms and stunning amenities. One thing that really stood out to me was the incredible service provided by the hotel staff, Ms. Rose from Ebb who went above and beyond to make my stay truly unforgettable. One of the standout features of this hotel was the fact that the staff member was always on hand to take excellent pictures of their guests. She also entertained our child and showed great concern for safety and his well being. Aside from the service , I can confidently say that this hotel provided me with one of the best nights of sleep I've had in a long time. If you're looking for a place to stay that prioritizes comfort and relaxation, I highly recommend

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Truly enjoyable Stay in the JW Marriott SG
desc: Had a 2 nights stay in the JW Marriott Singapore. Hotel room is clean and spacious with a good location which is situated near the Marina area. One of the key highlight is the club lounge. Very excellent hospitality service from the team. They provide personalised experience to every guest. Kudos to Hazel and her team members, Ren, Kay, Cora and Gab. Well deserving praise. Highly recommended to visit the Lounge access when staying in the Hotel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay
desc: This hotel is amazing : 2 swimming pools, a sauna, massages, a club lounge, and much more. I had a beautiful room at the highest level, the view was amazing, the lightening inside was amazing and the space inside was also amazing (bathroom, wardrobe, couch, etc.) On top of that, JW Marriott’s team is really good. Everyday, Hazel, the lady in the club lounge, was smiling, positive, polite, caring and funny. She made us feel at home, and this is the best we can feel in a hotel. I wish you all to meet her during your stay here. Hugo

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay, concerns rectified, wonderful staff including Director of Rooms Patrick and Hazel in the lounge.
desc: We had a concern about the assigned room but they gave us a new, better one in line with what we had booked. All the staff were gracious and accommodating especially Hazel in the lounge who was so friendly and made sure we were well taken care of. The Director of Rooms Patrick gave us advice and directions on where we could get a great local breakfast just outside the hotel and in general was so friendly, gracious, professional. He is a real asset to the hotel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Spa at JW Marriot
desc: I spent a week at this hotel in April on a business trip, everything was wonderful! This review is specifically for the spa facilities though which are outstanding. I was greeted by Cheryl, given a cup of ginger tea, and led to the thermal area with a steam spa, sauna and whirlpool to enjoy the amenities until my treatment. The facility is clean, and luxurious. My massage was absolutely phenomenal. I had a 60 minute treatment with Teri and left feeling refreshed and tension free. I appreciated being able to select the scent of oil, and just overall had a great experience.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic city view hotel
desc: This is a fantastic hotel stay experience. The lounge services is fabulous from the food, drink and friendly staff. The amazing lobby atmosphere. Accessibility to the public transport like MRT and buses. Wonderfully night city view.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Top class wedding venue & hospitality
desc: Dear JW Marriott Team, We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude for hosting our wedding at your beautiful venue. Our special day was truly magical, and we couldn't have asked for a better location to celebrate our love and commitment. From the moment we booked the venue until the last guest departed, your team exhibited exceptional professionalism, attentiveness, and genuine care. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that every detail was taken care of, and we are incredibly grateful for your dedication and hard work. The venue itself was absolutely stunning, with its elegant décor and screen. Coordinating with the vendors was a breeze with very good floral, wedding gifts/ cards of the great quality. To call out Eugene, who customized our pre wedding shoot to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Hotel
desc: I recently had the pleasure of staying at JWMarriot , and it was an unforgettable experience. From the moment I arrived, the staff went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction. The luxurious accommodations, coupled with exceptional service, made my stay truly memorable. The hotel’s prime location made exploring the city a breeze, and I can’t wait to return on my next visit. Highly recommended!”

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Quiet and comfie
desc: I originally booked JW because I could not get into Marina Bay for part of my stay. However I loved the boutique feel of the hotel, very comfortable beds/pillows and the amazing service (kudos to Ben for my room service). It is a smaller hotel and the staff really go above and beyond to make you feel at home. Quiet and peaceful. It will definitely be my preferred choice when I return to Singapore

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent Service from Hazel, Cora, Gab, Jaime,Alyssa & Kay and Nizam
desc: The hotel's exterior especially at night is mind blowing. Superb experience all throughout our stay. Very clean & love the minimalist design inside the room. The people in the lounge are very accommodating, friendly and best of all they make you feel extra special. Thank you for the very proactive & excellent service from Hazel, Cora, Gab, Jaime, Alyssa & Kay. The hotel's location is also great, just acrosd the street is Suntec Mall and Marina square. Love the Tasty food and drinks too.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Not quite miami but very good
desc: Stayed here multiple times for business and leisure The location is great - next to mrt and surrounded by shopping malls (raffles city, marina square, suntec) , restaurants and other hotels The hotel is newish, maybe 5-6 years old and the front porch filled with interesting sculptures The rooms probably have nice views depending on where you stay. If one were to nitpick - the curtains don’t close fully, no hairdryer socket in the bathroom The breakfast is very good and wrote a seperate review. The executive lounge good - less selection which is expected, but poorer service which is unexpected There are restaurants within the premises but not part of the hotel - akira back, madam fan etc. I suggest you venture out to get better food and value Didn’t have time to use the
