hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay
desc: Fantastic location & excellent staff . Hazel & Team at club lounge took great care ,made sure our stay was memorable. House keeping staff Anne took spl efforts to make up our rooms , Karen at front desk..well list is endless.. they made sure my marriott Ambassador status is truly rewarded.. had stayed here on business earlier many times..but this was first on vacation with family.. cannot ask for more

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful weekend getaway at JW Marriot Sth Beach
desc: Went to JW Marriott South Beach hotel for weekend gateway This hotel is perfectly located near underground railway transit , which connect you to high end dining near hotel building and low budget meals inside underground transit station Check in was effortless I went to room at 10th floor, room is nice and small ( it is studio room and cheapest room in this hotel) There is rocking chair . Time to go swimming fifteen minutes later I went to 18th floor Wonderful ! Swimming pool got shelter above which offer partial protection from rain .there is accompanying lounge bar, which serve bar food 18 Flow is the most wonderful experience It has gym, table tennis table.. After short swim, I ordered ice cream and cocktail in bar Cocktail drink was served first Ice cream was served

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Our Second Stay at this Outstanding Hotel
desc: Our first stay at this hotel was in November 2018. Ever since, we have been looking forward to another stay. While many things have changed since the pandemic, this hotel has not. Our stay was for five nights after leaving a cruise ship. Arriving at 10:00 AM, we were in our room by 11:00 AM. As a Marriott Lifetime Platinum we were upgraded to a corner suite on the 13th floor. Room was outstanding with fantastic views. Later in the day we were treated to a very nice welcome gift. The executive lounge is one of the best in all of Marriott. While there has been many staff changes due to the pandemic, we were delighted to see that Hazel was still there. Hazel is an outstanding gem. She went out of her way to make sure our every need was met, whether it was breakfast,

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay at JW Marriott
desc: Our experience at JW Marriott is truly amazing. Talgat made us feel very much welcome at check in… he made us feel like we have been friends for a long time. We spent a lot of time at the executive lounge because of the really friendly staff especially Hazel who always have a ready smile and good recommendations. Jaime, Gab, Kay, Alyssa, Cora, Tina and KK were also very helpful and make us look forward to our next stop at the executive lounge The food was a bonus. We appreciate the upgrade of our rooms. The teens are happy with the aesthetic of the room and look forward to taking photos of their OOTD 😃 Great experience. Thanks to the whole team!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive Lounge Staff is Top Notch
desc: The staff in the executive lounge is top notch! Special recognition goes to Hazel, Kay, Patrick, Ren, Cora, and Gab. The service is outstanding and a good mix of food choices each day. The front desk staff as well as the pool staff are also very nice. The rooms are nice as well; very comfortable beds and pillows. It’s a bit of a walk if you want to go to the Riverwalk and restaurants, but it is close to the MRT and it was easy to find a taxi or Grab ride at the hotel.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Hotel and Amazing Staff
desc: I decided to book JW Marriott South Beach for my stay in Singapore. The staff here was very accommodating, making sure I was well taken care of. The Executive lounge here was amazing, shout out to Jeini, she made sure my glass was full and made sure I had everything I needed, the rest of the team: KK, Hazel, Alyssa, Wany, Tina, Gab, Pirakash, and Nizam were also great, by the 2nd day already knew my usual breakfast drink and afternoon tea routine. I will book this hotel again because the staff here are amazing peeps.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great place to stay in Singapore.
desc: Great stay and hotel. Lot’s of nearby dining options. Room was generous with an amazing view. Executive lounge is a 10. Wish I’d spent more time on the 18th floor (wraps around hotel) outdoors relaxing and enjoying views. Only negative is that hallway on 20 th floor smelled slightly moldy. Special shoutout to Jeini and her coworkers in the executive lounge.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful Executive Lounge
desc: The hotel is conveniently located to many sites and close to the Esplanade MRT station. The Executive Lounge was wonderful with lots of tasty food options and great staff. Hazel, Jaime, Cora, Wouter, Kay and Gab were very welcoming and provide exceptional service. Hazel is awesome and took great care of us. She is very friendly and provided suggestions on where to visit in Singapore. We would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding banquet at JW Marriott Grand Ballroom
desc: We held our dinner wedding banquet at JW Marriott Grand Ballroom and it was a really beautiful place with the LED wall screen and lights installation! Dickson was assigned as our manager and helped us a great deal, including finding alternative dates and solutions for us when our original intended date was sadly taken. Dickson also helped entertain our many requests throughout the pre-wedding phase and during the actual day, and also helped to arrange to send flowers after the wedding when the original ones we had wanted were discarded away by accident. The facilities, such as Executive Lounge was also fantastic and the staff were also very helpful, offering us dining credits when we were unable to make it for breakfast. We would definitely recommend the JW Marriott Grand

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Number one in Singapore
desc: The staff is extremely friendly and polite. As well, the gym is highly professional-equipped. The instructors' team was always very helpful. The room was very clean and modern. Furthermore, the room cleaner makes every day a super job. We were absolutely flashed from the breakfast. This would be a high-quality and fresh breakfast. For us, one of the best hotels in Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Outstanding hotel
desc: We stayed here for a week in July 2023. Outstanding hotel and highly recommended: - linked to Raffles City, Suntec and MRT stations (City Hall and Esplanade); - housekeeping is reliable and comes in the morning, instead of you having to wait all day for them; - polite staff; - well equipped gym and friendly gym staff; - pool looks out to a beautiful city landscape but water is cold; - buffet breakfast has excellent spread; - good soundproofing of room, which makes it a peaceful and quiet room to retreat from the hustle and bustle in Singapore. Would definite return again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: GREAT EXPERIENCE
desc: a fantastic experience staying at JW Mariott. 1st class service. we enjoyed a lot. Staff are hospitable especially those Filipino service staff. Kudos to all the staff assigined at the exrcutive lounge for taking our meal extra special, especially to HAZEL for her warm hospitality. also, thank you to CORA,CHRIS,GAB,WANI,REN Truly, no one can beat Fililipinos. JW Mariott is hihgly recommended. Definitely we will be back again. -Sunny &Bebs

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent stay with a great staff
desc: This hotel is located perfectly for exploring Singapore. There are plenty of restaurants in the downstairs South Beach area and tunnels that connect it to the nearby Raffles Place via the MRT station. Using the Esplanade station you can get to just about anywhere you want to go in the city. Our room was quite spacious, being large enough to bring a rollaway bed for a third person without feeling too cramped. The bathroom was large and had plenty of mirrors everywhere. The only real negative about the room was the low light in the bathroom. The natural light in the room was more conducive to putting on makeup or shaving than the bathroom lighting. The staff provided excellent service, even apologizing for a delay in delivering something to the room even though we did not feel

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent hotel and great location
desc: Stunning hotel. JW Marriots are one of my favourite hotel brands to stay at. This property has such a great location with the trains just down from the hotel. Lots of restaurants and bars just down the escalator as well. The bathrooms are stunning with a heated toilet and huge tub. And they have bath crystals and a luffa sponge! Love little details like this! Loved, loved, loved the pools! 18th floor pool has stunning views but is a bit cold as it doesn't get sun. Foosball, ping pong and pool tables all in an open air format with a stunning view of the harbour. The pool on the 6th floor is also beautiful but less of a view. This pool does get sun and even has loungers in the water. Great set up with little "pods " for people to sit in poolside and have tons of

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hospitality and amazing interior design
desc: Every single service (check-in out, room cleaning, lounge, fitness room) was perfect for me. Especially, when I used the fitness room, the staff named “Andrew” was really really kind, far more than I expected. Because I’m Japanese so my English is not that well, but he kindly spoke slowly and chose easy words to get me understood easily. The most thing I was surprised is every time I went to the fitness room, he always said hello and called my name. He’d meet lots of people using the fitness room, but he kept remembering my name, which was impressed. I’ve never experienced such kind hospitality. I strongly recommend JW Marriott if you visit and stay Singapore. Quite nice location!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best location in Singapore to host a Wedding. Great atmosphere, great wedding perks.
desc: Wife and I hosted our lunch wedding at JW Marriott last month and have absolutely no regrets after having done so. Our point of contact Chanel Tan was professional and helpful every step of the way. From the time my wife and I were shortlisting venues up till the actual day of the wedding itself, Chanel was prompt in her responses and accommodating to our requests. Despite being a 6 course banquet, the portions were big and yummy. Chef Raymond followed through on our food tasting feedback. We received lots of positive feedback from our guests about the gorgeous LED wall and the overall ambience of the ballroom. It really is a sight to behold and is something you have to experience firsthand. Fingers crossed that i will have the opportunity to attend a wedding at JW Marriott

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best Hotel experience in Singapore
desc: We had an amazing experience. We will like to say a big thanks to especially to Khazlynn at Check in desk and Sara at the concierge for making my wife’s birthday experience a wonderful one. Thank you so so much. We would also like to thank Flora at Beach Rd Kitchen for making our breakfast the best ever. Their breakfast and dinner has so many choices. Best hotel in Singapore. We also would like to thank the Hotel Manager for a wonderful customer experience and paying attention to customers, engaging in discussions with us and interested in our views.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional service team beyond imagination
desc: The team of Hazel, Cora, Gab, Jaime, Ren, and Kay were very attentive to our needs in the lounge. They were always on task with a pleasant smile and a nice greeting. This team is an exemplary team and could be the superstar team to mimic across the Marriott World! Super group of people with a keen understanding of the value of exceptional service and hospitality. Look forward to seeing them again when we return!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: First-class stay
desc: Our big group of 11 had a wonderful time at the JW Marriott, enjoying everything from the new amenities and cleanliness to the prime location. What really stood out, though, was the service of the staff in the executive lounge. Hazel lived up to her tremendous reputation and instantly made us feel like family. Thank you — when in Singapore, we know there is only one place we want to stay!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: THUS JW DIES NOT MEET STANDARD
desc: Often long queues at Front Desk. No separate counters for elite members. Due to the location of the elevator lobby which is across from the Front Desk (unusually narrow corridor for a JW hotel), traffic thru the lobby via this narrow corridor is very congested. No other route to access the elevators. The Club Lounge does not do check-Ins or check-outs. Higher floor guest room corridors smell sewage. Guest shower room is moldy. It’s very large and make it difficult to clean and get all the water out. Drainage is slow due to flat floor. Hand held Shower head is at waist level. Kazlyn at Front Desk is very efficient and helpful. Thanks to Jazlyn!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing service
desc: Our experience at Marriott Southbeach has always been extraordinarily amazing! We were also there September last year and got the same truly wonderful experience! We met with Cora, Hazel, Gab and Pirakas from the executive lounge team and they were as always very welcoming and they made sure we are comfortable and served very well with everything we need. Amazingly, Cora and Hazel remembered us from our visit last year and they were very genuinely happy to see us again! Kuddos ladies for the excellent service, we hope to see you again next year!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional services by the hotel staffs
desc: Our stay at JW Marriott has been very delightful. My nieces celebrated their graduation in the hotel over the weekend and the staffs has been very welcoming. They surprised us with room decorations, chocolates and wine! It is beyond words and we are thankful. I would like to thank the staff for their warm hospitality - especially the Hotel Manager Patrick, the exec lounge staffs Carol, Hazel, Ren, Gab and Jaime for going out of their ways to make our stay very comfortable and special. Thank you JW Marriott, we will definitely come back again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Guest experience is topnotch here
desc: The bed and the views are awesome and amongst the best I've experienced. The bathtub has a gorgeous view of Marina Bay so you can enjoy soaking longer. I enjoyed the food and drinks in the lounge - evening cocktails are good pre-drinks before we go out to party. Gabriel, Hazel and Cora served us in the lounge and they were professional, friendly, and proactively helpful. They charmed us so much with their interactions and topnotch service, even when the lounge was full, checking in on us regularly and making sure we had everything we needed. A thoroughly enjoyable long weekend here at JW Marriot made better by such excellent service!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best hotel in SG
desc: Had a really enjoyable stay there last week. The room deco was really modern and chic. Had a good view of the city skyline as well. At the club lounge, the selection of food and alcohol was really great. The staff there were particularly friendly and helpful. Special shout-out to Hazel, Gab & Cora. Their hospitality is really commendable, checking in on our table every now and then. Overall had a pleasant experience. 👍

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A slick modern hotel but beware the east-facing rooms
desc: We mostly enjoyed our short stay at the JW Marriott. Well-located in the South Beach area and connected to shopping and transit by underground malls. Room was modern and nicely appointed. Service was friendly and efficient. The only problem we ran into was the pulsating light from the large outdoor TV screen at night across the courtyard from our east-facing room. Room (electric operated) curtains had gaps around the sides and top so that you couldn’t block out the light pulsing at night. It appeared to stop at midnight but we had early mornings and had to sleep early - we couldn’t even escape it by turning over because the facing walls in the room were all mirrored. Maybe it’s not a problem in higher rooms but it was on our floor and significantly interrupted a fundamental

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great place to unwind
desc: Me and my husband stayed over the weekend and since check in until we left the staff were very very helpful and professional. We had afternoon tea, night cocktail and as usual the awesome breakfast at the Executive Lounge. The team - Hazel, Cora, Gab, Ren, Jaime, Wani, and Kay, made our time very memorable. They were all very attentive, they suggest stuff (specially during night cocktail), and always ready to serve and provide excellent service to all patrons/diners. Special mention to Hazel who is always with a cheerful smile though they are busy with a full house and lots of guests. Very well done Hazel and team...and thank you for a great restful staycation and service you gave us..cheers guys!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Lovely graduation staycay at JW Marriott
desc: My uncles brought my sister and I for a weekend staycay at JW Marriott to celebrate our graduations. My sister and I were surprised by the staff’s warmth and exceptional service - from check in all the way to check out, it was very pleasant and comfortable. It was my sister and I’s first time going to the hotel executive lounge and when we were there, Cora and Hazel greeted us and always made sure that we were well taken care of. They served us drinks and talked to us and we would like to thank them for their excellent hospitality! Afterwards, when we went back to our room, we were pleasantly surprised by the balloons and graduation well wishes that the staff has put up for us! Thank you the Hotel Manager, Patrick for taking good care of us. Overall, we highly recommend

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hotel with great people
desc: Great hotel with great people especially Hazel, Cora, Gab, Jaime, Ren, Kay, Meng and Zhan at the Executive Lounge. Special mention to Hazel, with her professionalism was complemented by her genuine friendliness and approachability. The team were always willing to engage in friendly conversations, offering insights into the local culture and providing valuable tips for making the most of my stay. Their genuine enthusiasm and warmth added an extra layer of comfort and made me feel like an honored guest. Overall, the hotel attendants at this establishment were paragons of exceptional service. Their dedication, attention to detail, and personalized approach created an atmosphere that exuded warmth and hospitality. Their exemplary professionalism and commitment to guest

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent service by Hazel and team
desc: I recently had the pleasure of staying at JW Marriott and had an outstanding experience at their club lounge, thanks to the exceptional service provided by the team; Hazel, Cora, Gab, Ren, Mengzhan, Kay, and Wani. From the moment I stepped into the lounge, they made me feel like a valued guest. Special shout-out to Hazel, with her warm and friendly demeanor, greeted me with a genuine smile and ensured I was comfortable. She took the time to explain all the amenities available in the lounge and answered all my questions with great patience and knowledge. I cannot speak highly enough of Hazel and team by the incredible service they provided at the club lounge. They truly exemplify what excellent customer service should be. I will definitely be returning to JW Marriott, knowing

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good option for business in a nice area
desc: First time at this property and booked it as it’s pretty convenient to the airport and business meetings. Very helpful bellmen and bags were brought up as soon as I got to my room. We are lifetime titanium with ambassador status so have a nice room with a lovely view. I liked the light blocking blinds and shades that were important to me after a very long flight and working odd hours. I think the areas for improvement are (and, maybe it’s just the room we had), but there is absolutely NO space to set anything in the bathroom. The sink takes up the entire space and there’s barely a ledge for a toothbrush. I had to leave all my products in the bedroom and take them in as I needed them. It’s kind of bizarre because the bathroom is nice size. Also, I wasn’t a huge fan of the

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Celebrated our wedding in the most beautiful wedding ballroom in Singapore
desc: We made the right choice celebrating our wedding at JW. JW Wedding Ballroom is the most beautiful ballroom in Singapore. We were so happy during our wedding and whenever we think about it, we are satisfied. We would like to say special thanks to Chanel (Assistant Director of Events). Chanel helped us from the start till the end for many months. During our wedding, we would like to thank Nutthee (Banquet in-charge), Thana, Daniel (Banquet team), Eugene (AV), Chef Raymond, and his kitchen team. We love JW forever.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding at JW Marriott
desc: Did my wedding on 2nd June at JW Marriott and everything turned out better than I imagined, the suite while we were staying there was absolutely amazing I loved everything about the hotel, vibe was nice, service was great, food was good, special thanks to Chanel, Nutthee, Thana, Daniel, Eugene, Chef Raymond and his Kitchen Team for all your hard work during our wedding.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing hotel and service
desc: Absolutely one of my favorite hotels in the world and one of the most unique Marriott properties. Excellent location with easy access to MRT. Amazing Executive Lounge and 2 pools with stunning views. Consistently superior service that Marriott Elites will recognize. Highly recommend this property when visiting Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic Stay
desc: One of the best stay experiences in Singapore. Beautiful property and friendly staff!! I arrived early before the room was ready. Jeini at the executive lounge was very accommodating getting me situated with my luggage and introducing me to the scrumptious breakfast buffet! Everyday I see Jeini serving guests with grace while keeping order. I will stay at JW South Beach in my future visits to Singapore for sure!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Staycation @ JW Marriott
desc: Always great to spend the weekend over at JW Marriott. Coincidently it’s the NDP rehearsal so it’s abit crowded than usual. Nonetheless had a great view of the fireworks and the military vehicles ahead of NDP. Service weren’t compromised although the crowd was overwhelming. Our morning check in was smooth and fast by Khazlynn who greeted us with her sweet smile and comforting conversation and experience. Also needless to say their best lounge comparing with the other longes we visited. Their food, drinks and staffs are exceptionally heart warming and make you feel like home. Special thanks to the GEM Hazel and her team, Cora, Mingzhan, Patrick, Chris, Ren and Gab. Hazel never failed to remember every each guests she interacted with even down to details of our last visit and

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Loved the executive lounge
desc: Beautiful hotel in a perfect location. Stayed here for business and loved everyone at the executive lounge. Shout out to Hazel, Cora, Gab, REN, Chris and Yuki for making it an immaculate experience every time I went.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great experience with Andrew the lobby ambassador
desc: The check in line was moving slowly but thankfully we had the amazing company of the lobby ambassador, Andrew. He provided a ton of useful information (pool, breakfast, restaurants and bars). He also helped us with the luggage while we waited for the room to be ready. Most importantly, he made the wait much more pleasant than it would have been without his company!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great housekeeping team
desc: Stayed for a family vacation, this hotel doesn't offer keyless as any other Marriott hotels, front desk staff aren't trained well, when asking for birthday cake during our stay, one of the front desk guy told me that I need to check on the day itself in the morning as he isn't sure whether they have enough cake for the day. Chat with us option on bonvoy app doesn't work. Stayed there for a week but there wasn't any amenity sent to the room even though I am a gold elite member. However the housekeeping team was great and attention to details of our habits and needs during our stay.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome Service by Executive Lounge team
desc: The staff at the executive lounge - esp. Hazel, Cora, Gab, Ren, Chris, and Yuki, were very helpful and provided excellent service from Day 1 of our stay until we left. Definitely a pleasurable staycation and anniversary celebration for us. Thank you JE Marriott Executive Lounge team for making this a very memorable stay…will come back again soon for sure🙏🏻👏👍🥂🥂

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: We would love to give a thanks 🙏 to Andrew he is a lobby embasador amazing character made us very 😃 bubbly personality.
desc: Very upscale hotel in Singapore. Do not go to Marina bay sands very busy very long lines and staff very strict and rude . Jw pool has an amazing view breakfast also amazing beach road restaurant thanks

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fabulous stay at JW Marriott Singapore South Beach
desc: Great stay at JW Marriott Singapore South beach. We had a wonderful stay celebrating our anniversary and want to thank the entire JW Marriott team for making it extra special. We are lifetime platinum Bonvoy members and the executive lounge was one of the best I have ever visited. Breakfast was a wonderful buffet with egg station to order as well as afternoon teas service and evening drinks and food offerings. In particular Christopher in the executive lounge was very helpful and welcoming to us during our visit. We hope to return to Signapore soon and plan to return to the JW Marriott South Beach. …and Atlas bar is worth the hype. Check it out! Note to any travelers in July and August, they are doing practice sessions on the Saturdays before their national day (

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Lounge Service!
desc: Really amazing service by the Executive Lounge staff. In particular Cora, Danny, and the most spectacular Hazel! Special mention to Luna at the Front Desk as well for giving me an awesome room to see the fireworks!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Hotel @ Esplanade MRT station on the Circle MRT line
desc: The hotel is above the Esplanade MRT station on the Circle MRT line…Very convenient to reach from anywhere in Singapore…The check-in service was not that pleasant….The staff ( Helen ) was not that friendly…She needs training on customer service and treat guest with a smile and be helpful in answering their concerns and queries…The rooms are spacious and with all the best amenities….The housekeeping staff are very friendly and especially the staff ( William ) was extremely courteous and kept my room so clean….Thank you William for your great service….The staffs overall the hotel was very friendly and helpful…The breakfast was good….very good spread….the waiting staffs was also very nice….overall a great stay

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great location and stay
desc: Had an absolutely lovely stay at the Marriott in Singapore. It was close to the train station and nice restaurants. The room was very comfortable with great amenities. The view from the pool was amazing. Special shout out to Kelvin from the Flow 18 Gym for being so incredibly kind, helpful and looking after me.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent!!!
desc: Had a nice relaxing afternoon by the pool on the 6th floor and staff Rose was excellent and very attentive. Excellent room and executive lounge! Exciting lift they have with the lightings installed :-)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing staff
desc: I've recently stayed at JW Marriott South Beach and had a great experience. The staff of the hotel was incredibly kind and helpful, and made our stay at a hotel easy and enjoyable. I would like to especially thank Ali at breakfast, Syed and Andrew in the lobby and Wilbur at the concierge. They really put extra effort to help me and my mum oriatenate ourselves around Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Stunning and delicate wedding with great services !
desc: Dear JW Marriott SG Events Team, I would like to extend my heartfelt gratitude to the team for my wedding dinner banquet hosted on 28 July, it was absolutely stunning and amazing! The venue grand ballroom is so magical with the sparkling ceiling chandeliers, chapel shape architecture and LED wall together with colourful lightings, it is definitely a dream wedding venue for every couple to choose. The events team were very helpful along my wedding journey, especially Event Manager Dickson, he is patient, flexible and hard working who always try his best to accommodate our requests from planning stage, menu tasting as well as the big day, no matter related to wedding banquet or our accommodation arrangement. I could even see his present at the end of my banquet at mid night to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Thank You for the good service
desc: Hazel, Ren, Kay, Chris and Gab! Are all amazing staff here in JW Marriot Singapore South Beach. Thank You all for your warm welcome and accommodations! Keep it up and Again, Kudos to Hazel and Team! Will definitely coming back as we enjoyed our dinner and cockails here. Thank You!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Verrry Niize
desc: This is an upscale and fashionable hotel in an upscale and fashionable city.The hotel is modern and stylish.I stayed here at the recommendation of a colleague and I wasn't disappointed.I usually prefer small boutique hotels that have more local flavor, but the JW showed me that I could like large hi-rise hotels, too. It goes without saying that the service was excellent. I was a little concerned when I saw that there was a velvet rope to manage a check-in queue and was relieved that It wasn't needed. And I already miss the daily notes left in my room by Jean in housekeeping. I met several Americans staying there for work or pleasure and saw at least one sports team or school group.One of the staff members said to me that the guests are not mostly Americans and that it may have

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Very Enjoyable
desc: First visit to Singapore. Enjoyed this hotel location very much. Great accommodations with king bed plus rollaway bed (very comfortable). Lots of mirrors. Bar counter can double for a secondary vanity, as very small counter space in bathroom, with overly wide sink which didnt drain so well (too flat). Excellent toilet room with bidet features. Shower stall very spacious, however, at times water would run out of stall when using overhead spray option. No issues with handheld sprayer as it was located to the front of the stall. Convenient MRT access. Excellent food with vast selections that were included with our stay. Wonderfully attentive and polite service staff: Hazel (our favorite), Cora, Gab, Chris, Red, Yuki.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome staff and beautiful hotel
desc: Most excellent hotel with impeccable service! Staff has been incredibly friendly and helpful. Special acknowledgement to Kelvin at the Flow 18 gym who really went out of his way to ensure our family had a wonderful experience!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Terrible Experience
desc: I had a business trip and had to break up my week's trip with two visits. The first room on the 3rd floor was very noisy. Nothing worked, and it was damp. The electronic curtains and blinds were broken, and the sockets were loose. The staff at the front desk were incredibly unhelpful and rude. Do not get a late flight as they will not help you out with a place to store your bags - they wil not give you a late check out, and there is nowhere to hang out except the pool area, which is uncovered with no AC. I will not stay here again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best hotel for NDP 2023
desc: Being a Titanium Elite, finally got a suite upgrade after been staying for more then 10 stays and 30nights year to date. Overall service is fantastic especially from Talgat and Hazel. Highly recommended for those photographers to stay over a great Firework experience (NDP2023 Preview) facing Bay view. Downside is that breakfast benefits is only restricted to the lounge only. Will be back again with more friends and family, keeping my finger cross for elites benefits which might not be easy to get due to high occupancy.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional experience
desc: Outstanding service 5 star Hotel excellent food and breakfast buffet. Shoba the director of F&B provides excellent service and was so attentive to our requests for business breakfast meeting Clean spacious rooms. Wish all US JW’s will follow this exceptional standard

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great stay at this sophisticated yet comfortable hotel at the South Beach complex in Singapore
desc: Nothing but positive comments on my last stay at the JW Marriott. The hotel staff go over and beyond to provide first class service and make your stay an overall wonderful experience. One of the best club lounges I’ve encountered in my world travels, with almost daily rotation of international cuisine, friendly, professional Chef Arul preparing an array of delightful options catering to almost any dietary restriction, and the delightful Hazel looking out for all of her lounge customers while providing attentive service with a smile. The hotel gym was well equipped, and the gym attendant Kelvin took personal pride in keeping the facility well maintained, stocked with water and towels, even providing friendly and professional advice on proper use of the gym equipment. And so

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent Executive Lounge Good and Services
desc: It has always been a pleasant experience in JW Marriott South Beach. Food selection in the executive lounge is topnotch and are delightfully delectable. The service team in the lounge are very courteous and accommodating. I'd like to give a commendation to Hazel for excellent service. Coffee has never been this good with all her smile. Also, Renz, Cora and Kay are very helpful to our needs. Cheers!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fabulous Marriott
desc: Just had a most satisfying breakfast at the Executive Lounge in JW Mariott, Singapore, with friends. The Lounge offers a variety of bread, food, fruits and veggies, which I loved. The fruit juice and coffee served by Hazel were simply delicious. Hazel, Renz, Cora and Kay were so friendly and ready to assist us in our needs and queries.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: amazing hotel with prime location
desc: I stayed here for a week, its an amazing hotel with prime location, ambience was nice, delicious breakfast, swimming pool and view from 18th floor were wonderful! Special thanks to Kelvin who is a gym assistant, he trained me at gym in a short time to exercise well, he is a nice person. Overall a recommended hotel at Singapore.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great visit!
desc: Centrally located, clean and modern hotel. The room was spacious, and had an amazing view. Haze elevated the stay with her attention to detail, and constant smile at the executive lounge. Great assortment of food and drinks.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good location, stuff, pool
desc: The club rounge foods are nice and stuffs are friendly. Hotel location is good for the duck tour. I was able to access through the underground passage from the MRT station without getting wet in the rain.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Nice place with excellent taste.
desc: Breakfast at Executive Lounge is excellent!!! Marvellously delicious, with a vast array of cheese and fruits and bread, cold cuts and sausages and bacon. Special thanks to Hazel, Cora, Renz, Kay and Gab for the generous and warm welcome and hospitality. Kudos guys and keep up! Prayers and blessings always. 😍😍😍

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: HORRIBLE DISHONEST CUSTOMER SERVICE
desc: This was the worst hotel EVER!! We paid S$18,600 (!!!!) US$13,774 for 6 nights of hotel and when checking in the clerk told us that we would all be able to have breakfast, and then he later lied when told by his manager that he was not supposed to give us breakfast. The cleaning staff did not clean the shower and there was so much hair that accumulated that it flooded the bathroom floors and it spilled onto the carpets and rugs. Such dishonest and horrible customer service for an incredible amount of money!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Love the interior design of the hotel and excellent service
desc: Stayed at JW Marriott Singapore recently for a staycation. Love their service so we extended a night. The hotel is located near to the Esplanade MRT and Suntec City shopping mall. Room is clean and the pool at level 18 has a beautiful view of the city (was able to catch the fireworks during the National Day's rehearsal). Excellent service by Talgat, who is very friendly and efficient during check-in. Also a big thank you to Farah, Fizah, Andrew and Chun Yan for their amazing service. We had a great stay and would love to come back for another staycation.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: The True World Class Customer Service!
desc: Across all the resorts I stayed in and visited across the globe, I have never experienced exemplary and flawless services, only here in JW Marriott SG. Everybody was very accommodating, attentive and very keen to details. They always ensure that everybody's needs are met. Very luxurious feels and you will know right away that their ultimate goal is to represent the company to the best of their abilities. The moment you come in to their hotel and executive lounge, you are greeted and welcomed with such warmth and beautiful smiles. Guiding you to their best seats in the room. Everyone can learn from the JW Marriott SG Team. I would like to send my sincerest gratitude and thanks to Hazel, Renz, Cora, Kay, Gab and Angelo for making our stay in Singapore a memorable one and filled

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Highly rate this hotel.
desc: A lovely hotel. Staff are attentive, knowledgeable and spoke and understood English very well. The lounge is exceptional, staff are well trained and very interactive. The food is exceptional and our only complaint was that both swimming pools were too cold. I understand it was hot outside but it was even too cold for our children who never want to leave the pool. The location is excellent and the art around the hotel is very unique.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Service
desc: The staff in the executive lounge special mention to Hazel is just wonderful. She's been very attentive and made sure we are well taken cared of. Her smile is also contagious. I'd like to mention Cora, Gab, Ren and Kay too for their hospitality.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive Lounge
desc: The Executive lounge is the best feature of this JW Marriott. The staff that work here (especially Hazel) knows how to take care of people visiting this lounge. The food/drinks are delicious. The chefs first class, & if you are staying for a week like I did, the actually remember one's name, & what drinks one likes. Truly amazing. Thumbs up to Hazel and her colleagues for exceptional customer service.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Overall good stay
desc: Great overall stay. Beautiful pool area and open spaces to work, relax etc. Most of the folks were incredibly hospitable. The folks at the lounge stood out - big thanks to Hazel, Cora, Gab, Ren, KK and Nizam for the great hospitality every time!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best experience for a wedding banquet
desc: We did our wedding banquet there . Top notch service and experience . Simply worth every dime . The food was great the ambience was special and the staffs services was really world class . An unforgettable wedding experience

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: WoW experiences
desc: It was a very nice, relaxing, and great experience that I recently stay at JW south beach. I feel blessing that Mr Firdaus did noted my request and thanks him so much for all the preparation. Upon checkin Mrs Khazlyn the one who did the checkin and she is friendly and helpful - thanks for everything that they had made my stay feeling fantastic Last but not least - thanks for the housekeeping really did their good jobs make up the rooms and renew all the amenities in the room and also thanks to the Guest relation team and in room dining staff sending the birthday cake and welcome to the rooms -loved it Looking forward to visit again in future

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive Lounge is the highlight of this hotel
desc: Overall a nice and chic hotel; given its reputation, was expecting a bit more in terms of hotel policies/service (no free breakfast at the hotel restaurant for platinum/titanium/Ambassador elite members, exclusion from the executive lounge at 1 pm on the day of checkout even if you have a late check-out, lackluster hotel amenity offering at check-in, closing of the pool area at 9 pm, not having a 24 hour gym access policy, etc.). The executive lounge was a highlight, as was the friendliness of the staff, especially the bell person Andrew, the assistant concierge Wilbur, and the executive lounge attendant/bartender Andrew. Fantastic views of Singapore. Would come back in the future.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Love the room
desc: Love the suite room and it’s great we got to see the fireworks during NDP rehearsal! We enjoyed the breakfast buffet as well :) We had a really good sleep the pillows and sheets are so fluffy, and there’s his/her toilets as well!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Andrew the (Lobby) Ambassador for JW Marriott south Beach.
desc: Andrew the Lobby ambassador is just brilliant. So helpful and quick to notice a guest in need of assistance. An asset to the hotel, any hotel. Seen him a. Couple of time during our visit/stay in JW Marriott, been same since day1.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Another wonderful stay at the JW Marriott South Beach.
desc: Back to stay at the JW Marriott South Beach in the month of Jul. I love to stay at this hotel as the rooms here are always modern, clean and comfy. Front desk managers/personnels are professional and friendly when checking you in. The best part is the Executive Club lounge of the hotel. The service in the lounge are so good to the extent that you can simply spend your whole day there. The club staffs (Hazel, Cora, Gab and Ren) are always there giving you a big warmth welcome and ensure that you are well taken care of. It is clearly the best exec lounge in the local hotels with the wonderful team supporting. Do look out for the team whenever you visit the lounge.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Splendid first time experience.
desc: Checking in to their deluxe suite and it looked so premium and roomy looking. Loving their bedroom and washroom with a big screen glass view that we are able to enjoy the fireworks. Specially thanks to the friendly staffs they had whom are Gabriel, Renz, Hazel and Cora. Overall, we had a wonderful experience. :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Thank You & Appreciate
desc: Thank You So Much To JW MARRIOT Guest Relationship Team Made it a Special Mirror Art, Card& Prepared a BIRTHDAY Cake for Me At Here i also want to Thank You from Executive Lounge Team Gabriel, Hazel, Cora and Renz There are so kind,helpful and great service for us ❤️❤️❤️ Hope See You All Again ❤️❤️❤️ Your Regard By YIE HOW WONG

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Perfect wedding anniversary
desc: I have been to Singapore once 20 years ago and we chose to come back to celebrate our wedding anniversary with family. JW Marriott ticked all the boxes we were looking for and they didn’t disappoint! They kindly accommodated our requests for rooms on the same floor, and on top of that, a room with a partial view of the Marina! They also gave our rooms an earlier check in and late check out! And surprised us with a sweet anniversary cake and balloons! No request was too much! I called housekeeping when I found my room not done at about 4 pm to which they said my privacy button was on (must have pressed it by mistake). I requested for fresh towels and asked for more coffee pods. They said it won’t be a problem to make my room and since I was stepping out this worked out pretty

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wonderful stay as always!
desc: Wonderful stay as always! The JW Marriott Singapore South Beach is a superb property in a perfect location, and has a wonderful staff! It is always a pleasure to see Hazel managing the Executive Lounge with such professionalism and attention to detail. Hazel and her colleagues Gab, Ren, and Cora deliver great service throughout the day. I wish them well and look forward to seeing them on my next trip! I was thrilled to return to my favorite hotel in Singapore and can’t wait to return! Thank you to Mr. Nick Heath, GM, and his entire staff for making my stay memorable!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: excellent hotel
desc: we went at jw marriot for a honeymoon and when we get on the room there was a cake and ballons! the breakfast was excellent with many options and the swimming pool was just perfect and there u can find the best employee and helpful Kelvin

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Wedding Banquet beyond expectations
desc: Held our wedding banquet in the ballroom and it was a truly memorable night. The team was excellent, professional and experienced. They were flexible, responsive, and the food was enjoyed by all guests. Would recommend to all couples and the planning process was easy and it's one of the nicer looking ballrooms in Singapore (if not the nicest :P). Thank you team for the hard work in making our wedding banquet a success!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent hotel in Singapore
desc: Excellent, beautiful and luxurious. I have stayed here many times over the years since the hotel opened. Warm, welcoming and friendly staff throughout the hotel. Hazel Ren Gab in the Executive Lounge is truly an asset to the hotel. I look forward to seeing Hazel’s warm smile each time I visit.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Enjoyable Staycation
desc: Enjoyed our staycation here. The room was a standard size hotel room but quite comfortable. Loved the high tech toilet bowl which has a heated toilet seat, and also automatically lifts the lid up when you’re nearby and puts it down when you leave. Also comes with a remote control where you can explore other functions. Meal times at the club lounge were great! Hazel and team made sure we were very well taken care of during our meal times at there. Service was impeccable. We also made use of other facilities like the gym, pool, pool table and soccer table. Great family time! Looking forward to staying at JW Marriott South Beach again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fabulous but with a freezing pool!
desc: The hotel provides a fabulous environment - artsy deco, comfy beds, abundance of choices during buffet breakfast! However 2 cons to consider: 1. As the pool is always under the roof, it is freezing cold.... 2. Twin beds are not super single sized, therefore quite narrow. Nevertheless, great stay in a convenient location!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Disgrace for the profession
desc: Approach the concierge desk to seek assistance and some information…greeted the lady behind the counter by the name of Farah with “Good Morning” 3X only to be snob away without even acknowledging my greetings… I have to turn to other staff for assistance where she is not even busy doing anything behind the counter… her demure and attitude surely not in character of Marriot motto of “People First” for she had made me less of a person of importance in her presence… to make matter worse is that she’s a concierge, a profession where guest,client and even local vendor will be in 1st contact to seek assistance or direction and assistance… Only take 1 person to ruin the hard work of others as she had left a lasting impression indeed of JW Marriot.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent Lounge and Service
desc: As being a frequent traveler and an Ambassador member of Marriott Bonvoy, I am confident to say that JW Marriott South Beach Singapore has been one of the best service I have gotten. Great location, nice view with a pool at the top of the building. Food is amazing with many local varieties at the lounge. Service while checking in was very convenient. LOUNGE TEAM rocks and above and beyond expectations. Hazel is a star, she welcome us all the time and super patient to help. Thanks to Ren, Gab, Jaime, Menczhan, and Chris for being super quick and great with their service. All super king people. I will definitely come back. Sibel

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: The People make The Place.
desc: I booked a hotel car to meet me at the airport as I find it just easier than searching for cabs or tying to get wifi to use Uber. The hotel representative was waiting for me as I exited Customs, welcomed me to Singapore and guided me to the awaiting car. The service is often not cheap with any hotel but the welcoming feeling and hassle free arrival is well worth it. Upon arriving at the hotel (10am) I was advised that the room allocated for me wasn't ready but a larger room on a lower floor was. I snapped up the opportunity to be able to unpack and start my trip at 10.00am rather than waiting. The room was huge, spacious, spotless and very white. The rooms at this hotel are very bright and I loved it. There are MANY restaurants and places to get a drink or invite friends to. The

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Highly recommended
desc: I feel confident to recommend JW Marriott Singapore to everyone visiting the city. The hotel is conveniently located in the Marina Bay area, which is close to many shopping centers and attractions. However, it is not overly crowded or noisy at night. Just a very comfortable location where you can have a beautiful view from the room. The front desk staff is professional and courteous. I recommend a dedicated line for Marriott members with higher elite status to allow check-in/check-out at the executive lounge. The executive lounge provides excellent services and foods. Let me give you two examples - First, the staff remembered my family's drink preference for breakfast (i.e. two types of coffee, two types of juice, and milk) on the second day of our stay. Second, there was one

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Memorable Staycation
desc: Staycation at JWM for 3D2N. The service team at JWM lounge is attentive, dedicated and friendly. Breakfast spread is good. I particularly like the pastries corner. 😊 Each time we are there for breakfast and tea break, we are greeted with smile. They remembered the guests and checkin with us. Thank you Hazel, Cora, Kay, Yuki, Chris, Gab, good team of service staff.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: As usual, excellent service and hospitality from the JW Marriott crew. It's always a pleasure to meet with Talgat & the check-in service crew. Kudos to Hazel, Cora & Gab for the great lounge experience. And many thanks for the Birthday cake! 🥳

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Exceptional Service and a Homely Stay: A Shining Review for JW Marriott's Ambassador, Andrew!
desc: Dear JW Marriott Singapore, I am writing to commend your hotel ambassador, Andrew, for his outstanding service at the reception area. During my stay, I had the pleasure of encountering Andrew on three occasions, and each time he exceeded my expectations. Firstly, during check-in, Andrew welcomed me with a warm and friendly demeanor, making me feel at ease from the start. He was approachable and eager to assist with any questions I had, creating a positive first impression of the hotel. Secondly, when I requested parking tickets, Andrew was prompt and professional in handling the request. His efficiency made the process seamless and hassle-free. Today, when I asked for drinking water, Andrew's service was excellent. He not only provided the water promptly but also went the

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Awesome Stay
desc: I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude and the experience my spouse and I received during our recent stay. I would like to extend a special commendation to Mr. Wilbur Phua from the Concierge, who played an instrumental role in crafting a last-minute honeymoon itinerary that exceeded our wildest expectations. Not only did he flawlessly arrange our reservations at Les Amis and Atlas, but he also provided insightful recommendations that enriched our experience in this vibrant city. The check-in process, orchestrated by Ms. Angel, was another delightful encounter which made us feel instantly welcome and at ease. The room decoration by the guest relation team added a layer of magic to our honeymoon that words cannot fully capture. Lastly, the tall gentlemen (sorry we cant

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great hospitality!
desc: Tremendous hospitality given by the team here. Especially shout out to Gabriel, Cora, Hazel and the Director of Rooms Patrick Maurer! Felt very welcomed by them during my stay here. Cannot wait for my next visit here.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing stay for my birthday
desc: Was staying here for my birthday and the team at the Executive Lounge were excellent. Huge shoutout to Hazel, Cora, Gab, Alyssa, Qiyi, and Yuk for the impeccable evening with good food and alcohol (thanks for the prosecco and mimosa!). And also for the lovely chocolate cake and sparkling wine delivered to my room too :)

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: The luxury of being remembered
desc: Highly recommended. I stayed here 10 months ago on my first trip to Singapore. When I arrived this time, everyone remembered me. From the front desk to amazing staff in the executive lounge (I promise it to be one of the best lounges you've experienced at any Marriott property). Special thanks to Talgot, Hazel, Cora, Gab, Jaime, Red, Kay, and Patrick for making my 2-week stay a pampered pleasure. The room was great - fantastic shower and tub, the bed is comfortable, the gym is well equipped, the entire property is very clean and well kept.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Poorly design hotel
desc: Good location but that's about it. My main unhappiness is the design of the hotel... I think it's one of the worst design hotels that I've had the opportunity to stay in. 1) High floor rooms - I expected to see a view of Singapore but unfortunately the view was blocked by beams/etc which didn't allow this opportunity 2) Pool - did not have direct sun, the water was perpetually cold (I would say average of 19-20degree). pool was just a wade pool..... for show only. 3) Room design - feels like living in a house of mirrors. The whole room was full of mirrors, and for a tired traveler, this is NOT an advantage as it confuses me especially when I needed to get to the toilet in the middle of the night. 4) Executive room - smaller than expected, hardly any room to walk around or to

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Executive lounge staff were lovely ❤️
desc: Hazel, Copa, Gab, Qiyi, Yuki, and Kay at the executive lounge were amazing! They provided exceptional service, making me feel like a valued guest. Their attentiveness and friendly demeanor added a personal touch to my experience. I highly recommend visiting the lounge and being served by this incredible team!!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Excellent service by staff
desc: Stayed in JwMarriott for the first time and the standard was amazing especially from In Room Dining Joan and Nerio. They were extremely friendly and excellent with the service when I ordered. Allowing my stay to feel like a home away from home. Not only that Fizah from At Your Service took my order with patience despite many questions and requests for my order and explained it to be slow which i really appreciated. Luka from housekeeping was also very helpful and cheerful when sending me my room request he even went out of his way to help me move some furnitures around when i needed to place my things and didnt have space. Overall the service at this hotel has been splendid in general and I would love to return again soon.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: 5 Stars Service!
desc: I meet Andrew Lobby Ambassador during the group checkin, he was very polite and helpful to assist my group. He also recommended the hotel restaurants and Bars like Fish Pool. Checking in service was fast, with 7 counters serving at one time when there is a crowd, impressive! 5 stars service!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Average at best
desc: The hotel looks beautiful from the outside and common areas are very nice. However, the rooms are quite dated and not up to par for what this hotel portrays itself as. Staff is very professional however lacks any sense of kindness, empathy or just plain being nice. As a Marriott Titanium level do not expect any recognition of status or appreciation. The club experience is also something quite overrated. The club space is very small which leads the staff to do stupid things like not allowing your children traveling with you in… penny wise - dollar foolish mindset. Overall quite disappointed based on other reviews leading us to choose this establishment.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: We are extremely happy with the service and the ballroom from JW Marriot South Beach!
desc: We had our Wedding Banquet at JW Marriot Grand ballroom and it was the perfect wedding for us. Laura Chan was a very good wedding coordinator that helped us from the start to the end, very patient and helped us all the way with our requests. She even managed to find our lost item which we lost it in the hotel room. Laura did a deep search using CCTV and physically in the hotel room and her efforts paid off, she managed to find our small gold bar which meant alot to us! Thana the banquet manager was also very good and kind, he helped us alot in terms of the operations and made sure we enjoyed our wedding! Overall, we are extremely happy with the service and the ballroom from JW Marriot South Beach!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good service
desc: A wonderful stay so far with great hospitality provided by the executive lounge staff Cora, Hazel, Ren and Gab. The staff, under Cora’s guidance were attentive and proactive during their interactions with the guests. The front desk staff, Sabrina, was also very attentive and professional in ensuring the checkin process was completed efficiently.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: You'll find real relaxation.
desc: This time, I visited with my family of four. In my opinion, the location is good and the staff are very nice. Especially this time, I received a lot of information about the city from the ANDREW lobby ambassador. The atmosphere of guiding guests and the polite service were wonderful. It felt special. Thank you JW Marriott. The hotel has plenty of entertainment in table tennis and billiards. The breakfast has a wide variety and the staff are very well trained. Out of the hotel, there is an underground town near the station. If you want to walk around town, I recommend Bugis Street, which is about 10 minutes away. Enjoy with JW Marriott.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Variable
desc: Generally, a variable stay: I booked a suite room and was pleasantly surprised with an extremely early check-in, which I greatly appreciate.  However, there were cleanliness issues: food scraps and flies in the room, and even one which was dead/asleep on the bedsheets. There was also an unidentified blackish-looking item Had to endure the cleaners cleaning the room while I was inside. While this was happening, the cleaners, Angela, and xu qi, noticed that I finished the coffee , so they gave me more.  Regarding hardware, there were cracks/patches in parts of the room, and stains on the bathtub that couldn't be removed , so the room is definitely showing signs of age. Bed was comfortable and had a nice sleep. Had to inform the hotel multiple times about the cleanliness

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Service excellence
desc: There’s something about the hospitality at JW Marriott that makes one feel right at home. It’s not my first time here and definitely wouldn’t be the last. From the check-in at front desk right up till the check out process, the service has been impeccable as usual. The lounge experience has been wonderful, especially Hazel, remembering my preferences, it’s a really nice gesture. Gabriel at the lounge counter is also extremely friendly and welcoming. Looking forward to my next staycay here already.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: One of the best!
desc: This is one of best hotels that I'm lucky to frequent because of business trips. The staff is very friendly and the service is top notch. I get complementary access to the lounge which is so good that I look forward to it each time. Hazel, Jenny and the rest of the team are excelent and make you feel right at home. The food and drinks are so good that most nights I dont leave the hotel for dinner. Business travel is stressful but this place makes it more comfortable.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Executive Lounge!
desc: Staying at the JW Marriott was so pleasurable. The Executive Lounge was top notch and the friendly and attentive staff made being away from home bearable. Thanks to Hazel, Wanting, Gab, Jaime, Ren and Yuki!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Splendid staycation at the JW Marriott
desc: Returned to stay at the JW marriott this month. As usual, got to stay in a very nice comfy room on the top floor. The club lounge experience is superb. Gab, Hazel, Cora and Renz treat all guests in the lounge with the most sincere and genuine gestures! Floor 18th has nice Pananormic views and entertaining activities. Lastly, front desk staffs are really nice and friendly esp. Angelina and the manager Khazlyn.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Experience
desc: Great service. Great location. Clean. It is not cheap but it is worth the price. If you like a great service with everything in a walking distance, this is the perfect place. Amazing view from the outdoor 18th floor infinity pool with bar and seating area..

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best with Lounge Access
desc: My partner and I stayed at the JW for the Singapore F1 Grand Prix on the tail end of our Asia trip. All the service we received was excellent and our stay in Singapore was the highlight of our trip. We were checked in and given some great local restaurant recommendations (go to the Coconut Club!). Housekeeping came twice a day and kept our towels and water bottles stocked which was much appreciated with the extremely hot and humid weather. Lastly, the executive lounge was extremely convenient for starting the day with a hearty breakfast as well as grabbing a quick bite and drink in between Grand Prix events. Hazel and the rest of the team were so hospitable! Zone 1 was easily accessible by the nearby MRT which made the the commute from our hotel room to our grand stand seat

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Fantastic service and stay
desc: Such a beautiful hotel with magnificent views and attentive staff. Everyone was incredibly helpful with a special recognition to Moon in house keeping for going the extra mile and making my stay even more comfortable and to Patrick who made my check out a breeze after some long hours of work. It was greatly appreciated! Cannot rate this place highly enough. I look forward to returning. Thank you all.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: First time at JW, truly remarkable experience
desc: This is my first time at JW Marriott, and it was truly exceptional. The check-in process was smooth and room was already available even though I arrived early. The room design was chic and modern with a good view of the city. I would like to give special recognition to Hazel, a server at the club lounge who made my experience even more memorable. She was dedicated to ensuring my dining experience was perfect. She consistently checked on me to make sure I was settling well with the food and drinks, and even going the extra mile to recommending drinks and customised cocktails. Her warm hospitality and genuine care for guests made me feel valued. Overall, JW offers a perfect blend of luxury and hospitality that sets it apart from other top-tier hotel chains. I will definitely

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Pre-wedding experience
desc: Been preparing for our wedding scheduled for Nov 2023 at JW Marriott and the experience thus far with the hotel has been smooth! Shoutout to Laura for being responsive and accommodating to our feedback/requests as well!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: First trip to Singapore
desc: We enjoyed our short stay in Singapore. The hotel was modern and clean. The staff were very accommodating and helpful. The executive lounge had an amazing breakfast with so many options, both weather and local. The gym was small, but had everything we needed. The pool area and outside seating area were relaxing with so much beautiful greenery. The location was great with easy access to local attractions. We hope to come back!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: World class hotel
desc: This was our third stay at the JW Marriott at South Beach for the Singapore Formula 1 GP. Itis one of the best hotels we've ever stayed at and is located adjacent to the Esplanade MRT station, two stops away from the F1 course. The roof bar and pool actually overlook Turn 13 on the course ....... as did our room! The hotel is modern, and impeccably maintained. The staff are professional, responsive, friendly, and extremely customer focused. There are excellent high end restaurants adjacent to the Hotel in the old Singapore Defense Forces NCO club, and also some excellent more informal in the open are plaza adjacent to the hotel (on the way to the MRT station). We stayed in a king sized room from which we could see (and hear) cars turning at Turn 13 on the circuit. The room

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Amazing Birthday Staycation
desc: Came here for a birthday staycaytion. Room was amazing and had a lil surprise cake from the team. Would also love to thank the executive lounge team - Hazel, Cora, Gabriel, Ming Zhan, Jaime for their lovely service and being real attentive to my family and I! Kudos to them for making my birthday an extra special, amazing and memorable one! 10/10 would be back again!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Best Service EVERRRR
desc: Came for a weekend staycation and was blown away by the awesome service I received. Check in was flawless and had a room with an amazing view. The thing that topped my stay here was the amicable service I received from Hazel and Cora from the executive lounge. From their professional service, to their attentiveness, and most of all coming into the lounge and them knowing what my go to drinks and snack were just after 1 day. If this isn't top notch, I don't know what is. They really set the standards of JW marriott. Can't wait for my next visit here!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: A Great Marriott!
desc: Excellent hotel with wonderful staff. First, lounge team was very friendly and professional - Hazel, and all the team were always helpful. Spa staff and bar staff on 18th floor (Kelvin and Shaarwin) were great. Overall a delightful experience.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Could be better.
desc: Lacked the minute details that separates this Luxury brand with other standard-premium hotels. Upon arrival, door staffs were busy chatting instead and failed to assist me with exiting my pickup. I was left to obtain the luggage from the boot of the car with no luggage assistance even though i was dropped in front of the main door 5 steps away from the main carpet 7 steps away from the bellman counter. Check in was not a pleasant experience. Only two Front Desk attendants to check in 5 guests before me. There was a line to distinguish elite members and non-elite members, but at the end of the line we were all just trying to get the attention of the next available attendant of the two. One staff offered water while waiting, (good job - thanks!) But that was it.. even he

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Superlative service and superb location
desc: My wife and we’re treated with great respect and consideration by all the Marriott staff but in particular those working in the executive lounge. We would like to shower the highest praise on Hazel, Gab, Cora, Jaime, Yuki and Meng Zhan. We will be back to enjoy their pampering again.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Good hotel
desc: Great location near the MRT station. Had the chance to visit the executive lounge. Hazel & renz was phenomenal. The food was nice also. Also jullean was also very attentive and friendly. Would like to come back again…………………………………………………..

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: the place is near to the tourist spots
desc: The place is near to the tourist spots. Also near from suntec city if u want to do some shopping. had the opportunity to experience the executive lounge for afternoon tea, Hazel, Jullean, Gab and Renz, provided exceptional service. The food was good as well. I look forward to returning in the future.

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Lovely staycation
desc: I went for a swim at the infinity pool and was greeted with warmest service by Rose! She greeted me with big bright smile which really makes my day! She is also very warm providing me with towels and water before i enter the pool! Rose really makes my day with her jovial and caring character!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Great Experience!
desc: It was a fantastic place and all the staff are so kind. I met Rose in the Gym and she was so accomodating and so kind. She offers me a bottle of water and a towel. She also said that i need to eat apple after my work out to regain my energy. Simple gestures but means a lot to me. I let my wife meet her, so that my wife gets new friend at the gym. Thank you Rose!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: Spacious room with gorgeous view; Excellent service!
desc: Clean and comfortable room with gorgeous marina & bay view, making my stay really relaxing. Service level was pretty high, I had a pleasant experience during check-in and everything was a breeze. I also had an enjoyable experience at the club lounge. Food was different every day and service team was excellent. Hazel was very hospitable and she made every guest feel welcomed. She was constantly smiling and always happy to serve. The team was also very prompt in clearing away empty plates and glasses, enabling guests to go back for seconds. Keep up the good work!

hotelname: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: World class hotel
desc: This was our third stay at the JW Marriott at South Beach for the Singapore Formula 1 GP. Itis one of the best hotels we've ever stayed at and is located adjacent to the Esplanade MRT station, two stops away from the F1 course. The roof bar and pool actually overlook Turn 13 on the course ....... as did our room! The hotel is modern, and impeccably maintained. The staff are professional, responsive, friendly, and extremely customer focused. There are excellent high end restaurants adjacent to the Hotel in the old Singapore Defense Forces NCO club, and also some excellent more informal in the open are plaza adjacent to the hotel (on the way to the MRT station). We stayed in a king sized room from which we could see (and hear) cars turning at Turn 13 on the circuit. The room
